  Employee</u>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.15(a)</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Response
  Costs</u>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.14(a)(ii)</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>SEC</u></font>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9
.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.17(b)</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Transferred Employees</u></font>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.1(a)(vi)</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .00
01pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Transition Services Agreement</u></font>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.7</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Transitional Retiree</u></font>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt
;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.7(a)</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>U.S. Abbott
  Pension Plans</u>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.10</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>U.S.
  Business Employee</u>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.1(a)(i)</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>U.S. GE DC
  Plans</u>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.5(a)</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>U.S. GE
  Pension Plans</u>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.3</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">  <td width="88%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:88.26%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>U.S. Transferred Employee</u></font>&#148;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="2%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0p
t .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:9.36%;">  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.1(a)(ii)</font></p>  </td>  </tr>  </table>  <p style="margin:12.0pt 0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\fc\319115751_D11905_1658493\1583-2-ki.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jan 31 09:11 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
    <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 2<a name="Article2_083045"></a></font></b></p>  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">PURCHASE
AND SALE</font></b></p>  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 2.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Purchase and Sale of the Purchased
Assets.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the terms and subject to the conditions of this
Agreement, at the Closing, Abbott shall sell, convey, assign, transfer and
deliver, or cause its Affiliates&#160; to
sell, convey, assign, transfer and deliver, to GE or one or more of its
Affiliates (A) the Business Intellectual Property and the GE Mixed-Use
Intellectual Property and (B) free and clear of Encumbrances (other than
Permitted Encumbrances) (i) all the assets, rights and properties of Abbott and
its Affiliates, of every kind and description (other than Intellectual
Property, which is addressed in clause (A) above, and those assets, rights and
properties that are addressed in clauses (B)(ii) and (B)(iii) below) and
wherever located, whether tangible or intangible, real, personal or mixed, that
(except as otherwise expressly set forth in this Agreement or the Ancillary
Agreements) are used primarily in connection with, or primarily related to, the
Business, (ii) the Owned Business Real Property and Leased Business Real
Property and (iii) all the animals, aliquots of cell-lines and antisera that
are used exclusively in connection with, or related exclusively to, the
Business (collectively, the &#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Purchased Assets</u></font>&#148;),
and GE or one or more of its Affiliates shall purchase the Purchased Assets,
including the following:</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all of the
assets reflected on the Closing Date Balance Sheet;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all rights of
Abbott and its Affiliates in the Abbott Products;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the
furniture, fixtures, office equipment and laboratory equipment located at the
Owned Business Real Property;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the
furniture, fixtures, office equipment and laboratory equipment located at the
Leased Business Real Property;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all rights of
Abbott and its Affiliates in the installed instrument bases of the Abbott
Products;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all computer
software, data and information, and all related hardware, in each case as set
forth on <u>Schedule 2.1(f)</u>;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all other
tangible personal property, including machinery, equipment, training materials
and equipment, mechanical and spare parts, supplies, owned and leased motor
vehicles, mobile phones and personal digital assistants used by the Transferred
Employees, fixtures, trade fixtures, tools, tooling, dyes, production supplies
and other tangible property of any kind, in each case used primarily in
connection with, or related primarily to, the Business;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; subject to <u>Section
7.8</u> and <u>Section 7.9(a)</u> and except as set forth in <u>Section 2.2</u>,
any Contract to the extent used in the Business (a &#147;<u>Business Contract</u>&#148;);</font></p>
 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='12',FILE='C:\fc\319115751_D11905_1658493\1583-2-ki.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jan 31 09:11 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
    <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the
Registrations to the extent used in, or related to, the Business supported by
and including: (i) the original documents and all related data, records, and
correspondence under the possession of Abbott or its Affiliates (or that are
accessible to Abbott or its Affiliates using commercially reasonable efforts)
evidencing the Registrations issued to Abbott or its Affiliates by a
Governmental Authority, in each case to the extent assignable with or without
the Consent of the issuing Governmental Authority; and (ii) all related
Registration applications, clinical research and trial agreements, data results
and records of clinical trials and marketing research, design history files
(including the redbooks), technical files, drawings, manufacturing, packaging
and labeling specifications, validation documentation, packaging
specifications, quality control standards and other documentation, research
tools, laboratory notebooks, files and correspondence with regulatory agencies
and quality reports, and all relevant pricing information and correspondence
with Governmental Authorities with respect to such pricing matters;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(j)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; subject to <u>Section
7.6(a)</u>, all product labeling, advertising, marketing and promotional
materials and all other printed or written materials used primarily in connection
with, or related primarily to, the Business;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(k)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; subject to <u>Section
7.9(b)</u> and except for intercompany receivables between Abbott and any of
its Affiliates, or between any Affiliate of Abbott and any other Affiliate of
Abbott (including those (i) between Abbott and its Affiliates, on the one hand,
and the Abbott Diagnostics Division Business or the Abbott Point of Care
Business, on the other hand, or (ii) between the Abbott Diagnostics Division
Business and the Abbott Point of Care Business), all accounts, notes and other
receivables resulting from sales by Abbott or its Affiliates of products or
services to the extent generated by, or related to, the Business, whether
current or noncurrent, including any value added Taxes or similar Taxes levied on
such accounts receivable, any unpaid interest accrued on such accounts
receivable and all file documentation related to such accounts, notes and other
receivables, including invoices, shipping documents, communications and
correspondence submitted to or received from customers related to such sales;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(l)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all claims,
causes of action, choses in action, rights of recovery and rights of set-off of
any kind (including the right to sue and recover for past infringements or
misappropriations of Business Intellectual Property or, to the extent related
to the Business, GE Mixed-Use Intellectual Property), in each case to the
extent arising from, or related to, the Business, except to the extent any of
the foregoing relate to (i) Excluded Assets or Excluded Liabilities or (ii)
intercompany receivables between Abbott and any of its Affiliates, or between
any Affiliate of Abbott and any other Affiliates of Abbott (including those (i)
between Abbott and its Affiliates, on the one hand, and the Abbott Diagnostics
Division Business or the Abbott Point of Care Business, on the other hand, or
(ii) between the Abbott Diagnostics Division Business and the Abbott Point of
Care Business);</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(m)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all
inventories, including raw materials, works in process, semi-finished and
finished Abbott Products, stores, replacement and spare parts, packaging
materials (subject to <u>Section 7.6</u>), operating supplies and inventory on
consignment, in transit or deposited in a warehouse, in each case to the extent
used primarily in connection with, or related primarily to, the Abbott
Products;</font></p>
 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='13',FILE='C:\fc\319115751_D11905_1658493\1583-2-ki.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jan 31 09:11 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
    <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(n)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all
prepayments, security deposits, refunds (other than any refunds with respect to
Taxes to which Abbott is entitled pursuant to <u>Section 9.4</u>) and prepaid
expenses, in each case to the extent used in, or related to, the Business;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(o)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all income,
royalties and payments receivable with respect to any Business Intellectual
Property or any GE Mixed-Use Intellectual Property to the extent related to the
Business;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(p)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; copies of all
Books, Records and Files (other than income and similar Tax Returns and related
Books, Records and Files), to the extent used in, or related to, the Business; <u>provided</u>,
<u>however</u>, that Abbott and its Affiliates may redact any information to
the extent used in, or related to, the Excluded Assets or Abbott Other
Businesses from Books, Records and Files and similar materials conveyed
pursuant to this <u>Section 2.1(p)</u>; <u>provided</u>, <u>further</u>, that
such redaction shall not impair any information related to the Business
contained in such Books, Records and Files and similar materials;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(q)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; other than to
the extent related to the Excluded Assets or Abbott Other Businesses, all
permits, licenses, certifications and approvals from all permitting, licensing,
accrediting and certifying agencies, and the rights to all data and records
held by such permitting, licensing, accrediting and certifying agencies, in
each case to the extent transferable and used in, or related to, the Business;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(r)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all claims
or benefits in, to or under any express or implied warranties from suppliers of
goods or services relating to inventory sold or delivered to Abbott or any
Affiliate of Abbott prior to the Closing, in each case to the extent used in,
or related to, the Business;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(s)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; copies of Tax
Returns and other materials set forth on <u>Schedule 2.1(s)</u>; <u>provided</u>,
<u>however</u>, that Abbott and its Affiliates may redact any information to
the extent used in, or related to, the Excluded Assets or Abbott Other
Businesses from Tax Returns and similar materials conveyed pursuant to this <u>Section
2.1(s)</u>; <u>provided</u>, <u>further</u>, that such redaction shall not
impair any information related to the Business contained in such Tax Returns
and similar materials;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(t)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all goodwill
of the Business as a going concern; and</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(u)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all rights of
GE and its Affiliates arising under this Agreement, the Ancillary Agreements or
from the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereby or thereby.</font></p>  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 2.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Excluded Assets.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding
anything to the contrary in this Agreement, GE shall not purchase or otherwise
acquire, and the Purchased Assets shall not include, any right, title and
interest in or to any of the following assets (such assets being collectively
referred to hereinafter as the &#147;<u>Excluded Assets</u>&#148;):</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all the
assets, rights and properties of every kind and description and wherever
located, whether tangible or intangible, real, personal or mixed of the Abbott
Other</font></p>
 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='14',FILE='C:\fc\319115751_D11905_1658493\1583-2-ki.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jan 31 09:11 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
    <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Businesses
to the extent such assets are not described in <u>Section 2.1</u>
(collectively, the &#147;<u>Excluded Businesses</u>&#148;);</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all rights of
Abbott and its Affiliates arising under this Agreement, the Ancillary
Agreements or from the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereby or
thereby;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; except as
contemplated by <u>Section 2.1(n)</u>, all cash and cash equivalents,
securities and negotiable instruments on hand, in lock boxes, in financial
institutions or elsewhere, including any cash residing in any collateral cash
account securing any obligation or contingent obligation;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all intercompany accounts between </font><font color="black"><font style="color:windowtext;">Abbott
and any of its Affiliates, or between any Affiliate of Abbott and any other
Affiliate of Abbott (including those</font> between the Abbott Diagnostics
Division Business and the Abbott Point of Care Business</font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">);</font></p>  <p style="color:black;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the
Excluded Owned Business Real Property;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">the
Excluded Leased Business Real Property;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(g)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all
Intellectual Property rights, except (i) the Business Intellectual Property,
(ii) the GE Mixed-Use Intellectual Property, (iii) subject to <u>Section 7.9(a)</u>,
the rights to Intellectual Property included in the Business Contracts
described in <u>Section 2.1(h)</u>, (iv) the rights granted to GE to the
Licensed Marks pursuant to <u>Section 7.6(a)</u> and (v) the rights granted to
GE to the Abbott Mixed-Use Intellectual Property pursuant to <u>Section 7.6(b)</u>;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all insurance
policies relating to the Business and all claims, credits, causes of action or
rights thereunder and proceeds thereof;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all assets
of any employee or independent contractor compensation or benefit plan, program
or arrangement that is maintained or contributed to by Abbott or any of its
Affiliates, except for those assets that are transferred to GE pursuant to <u>Article
8</u>;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(j)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; any right to
any refund or credit with respect to Taxes in accordance with the provisions of
<u>Article 9</u>;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(k)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; those assets
listed on <u>Schedule 2.2(k)</u>; and</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(l)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; those assets
related to the Abbott Humanitarian Program which are listed on <u>Schedule
2.2(l)</u>.</font></p>  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 2.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Assumed Liabilities.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;At
the Closing, GE shall assume, or shall cause GE&#146;s Affiliates to assume and
agree to, pay, perform and discharge when due, any and all Liabilities of Abbott
and Abbott&#146;s Affiliates to the extent relating to or arising out of the
Business or the Purchased Assets, other than the Excluded Liabilities set forth
in <u>Section 2.4</u> below (collectively, the &#147;<u>Assumed Liabilities</u>&#148;),
including the following:</font></p>
 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='15',FILE='C:\fc\319115751_D11905_1658493\1583-2-ki.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jan 31 09:11 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
    <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all Liabilities
of Abbott and Abbott&#146;s Affiliates reflected on the Closing Date Balance Sheet;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; subject to <u>Section
7.8</u> and <u>Section 7.9(a)</u> and except as set forth in <u>Section 2.4</u>,
all non-monetary Liabilities of Abbott and Abbott&#146;s Affiliates under (i) the
Business Contracts and (ii) the Contracts entered into by Abbott and Abbott&#146;s
Affiliates to the extent used in connection with, or related to, the Business
after the date hereof consistent with the terms of this Agreement, and all
monetary Liabilities under the Business Contracts and the Contracts referred to
in clause (ii) above to the extent they relate to the delivery of property or
service to the Business, in each case except to the extent such Liabilities,
but for a breach or default by Abbott or any of its Affiliates, would have been
paid, performed or otherwise discharged on or prior to the Closing Date or to
the extent the same arise out of any such breach or default;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the
Liabilities assumed pursuant to <u>Articles 8</u> or <u>9</u>, any other
provision of this Agreement, the Ancillary Agreements and the Schedules hereto
and thereto; and</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all
Liabilities under the Consent Decree.</font></p>  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 2.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Excluded Liabilities.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding
anything to the contrary in <u>Section 2.3</u>, GE shall not assume or be
obligated to pay, perform or otherwise discharge any of the following
Liabilities of Abbott or its Affiliates (all such liabilities and obligations
not being assumed being herein called the &#147;<u>Excluded Liabilities</u>&#148;):</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all
Liabilities to the extent relating to or arising out of assets or businesses of
Abbott or any of its Affiliates that are not included in the Purchased Assets
or related to the Business prior to Closing;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all
Liabilities retained by Abbott and its Affiliates pursuant to <u>Articles 8</u>
or <u>9</u>, any other provision of this Agreement, the Ancillary Agreements
and the Schedules hereto and thereto;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all Financial
Indebtedness of Abbott or any of its Affiliates;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all
intercompany payables and loans between Abbott and any of its Affiliates, or
between any Affiliate of Abbott and any other Affiliate of Abbott (including
those (i) between Abbott and its Affiliates, on the one hand, and the Abbott
Diagnostics Division Business or the Abbott Point of Care Business, on the
other hand, or (ii) between the Abbott Diagnostics Division Business and the
Abbott Point of Care Business); and</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; any items
listed on <u>Schedule 2.4(e)</u>.</font></p>
 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='16',FILE='C:\fc\319115751_D11905_1658493\1583-2-ki.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jan 31 09:11 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
    <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE
3</font></b></p>  <p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">PURCHASE
PRICE</font></b></p>  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 3.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Purchase Price.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;The
purchase price for the Purchased Assets and the covenant not to compete
described in <u>Section 7.13</u> (the &#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Purchase Price</u></font>&#148;)
shall be determined in accordance with this <u>Article 3</u> and shall equal:</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; $8,130,000,000
(the &#147;<u>Closing Date Payment</u>&#148;) minus</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the Closing
Date Balance Sheet Adjustment Amount plus</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the Assumed
Liabilities.</font></p>  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 3.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Determination of Closing Date
Balance Sheet Adjustment.</u></font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; As promptly
as practicable following the Closing Date (but not later than ninety (90) days
after the Closing Date), Abbott and its Affiliates shall prepare, in accordance
with GAAP and, where in accordance with GAAP, <strong><b><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-weight:normal;">on a basis consistent with the preparation of the
balance sheets used to determine the Minimum Net Worth</font></b></strong>,
a balance sheet as of the Closing Date of the Business (the &#147;<u>Preliminary
Closing Date Balance Sheet</u>&#148;) and deliver the Preliminary Closing Date Balance
Sheet to the Independent Accounting Firm.&#160;
Concurrently with the delivery of the Preliminary Closing Date Balance
Sheet, Abbott shall deliver to GE (i) a schedule showing all adjustments
reflected on the Preliminary Closing Date Balance Sheet resulting from items
not in the ordinary course of the Business in respect of the period from the
Performance Balance Sheet Date to the Closing Date and (ii) a schedule showing
all adjustments resulting from material changes to GAAP that are effective
between the Performance Balance Sheet Date and prior to the Closing Date. For
purposes of determining the Preliminary Closing Balance Sheet, Abbott shall
continue to depreciate and amortize long-term assets consistent with its
policies for depreciating and amortizing long-term assets used in determining
the Minimum Net Worth.&#160; Abbott and its
Affiliates shall cause the Independent Accounting Firm to conduct an audit of
the Preliminary Closing Date Balance Sheet as promptly as reasonably possible
(but not later than ninety (90) days after receipt thereof) and, upon
completion of such audit (but not later than ninety (90) days after such
receipt), to deliver a written notice with respect to the Preliminary Closing
Date Balance Sheet to each of GE and Abbott setting forth:</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 36.0pt 12.0pt 0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160; a summary of all
adjustments, if any, to the Preliminary Closing Date Balance Sheet necessary to
permit the Independent Accounting Firm to deliver the audit report described
below; and</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 36.0pt 12.0pt 0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160; an opinion
stating that the Preliminary Closing Date Balance Sheet (after giving effect to
such adjustments) as audited by such firm has been prepared in accordance with
GAAP and, where in accordance with GAAP, on a basis consistent with the
preparation of the balance sheets used to determine the Minimum Net Worth (such
written notice and related summary and audit report being herein called the &#147;<u>Closing
Date Balance Sheet Audit Report</u>&#148;).</font></p>
 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='17',FILE='C:\fc\319115751_D11905_1658493\1583-2-ki.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jan 31 09:11 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
    <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 36.0pt 12.0pt 0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">The Preliminary Closing Date Balance
Sheet, as so determined but after giving effect to the adjustments referred to
in clause (i), is herein called the &#147;<u>Closing Date Balance Sheet</u>.&#148;</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The parties
hereto shall make available to each other and the Independent Accounting Firm
such books, records and other information (including work papers) as any of the
foregoing may reasonably request to prepare or review, as applicable, the
Preliminary Closing Date Balance Sheet.&#160;
The fees and expenses of the Independent Accounting Firm shall be paid
by GE.</font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; If the
Independent Accounting Firm concludes that it is unable to determine one or
more issues or amounts necessary to complete an audit of the Preliminary
Closing Date Balance Sheet hereunder and prepare and deliver the Closing Date
Balance Sheet Audit Report, it shall promptly so notify GE and Abbott who shall
endeavor to jointly agree on such issue or amount.&#160; If GE and Abbott are unable to reach a
written agreement concerning such issue or amount within fifteen (15) days
after receipt of such notice, the issue or amount in question shall be
determined in accordance with the Alternative Dispute Resolution (&#147;<u>ADR</u>&#148;)
provisions set forth on <u>Schedule 13.8</u>, the result of which shall be
binding upon the parties.&#160; The decision
of the neutral as to the issue or amount in question shall be conclusive and
binding for purposes of use hereunder by the Independent Accounting Firm.&#160; Following the determination of any such issue
or amount by written agreement of GE and Abbott or by ADR, the Independent
Accounting Firm shall proceed to complete its audit and the preparation and
delivery of the Closing Date Balance Sheet Audit Report as contemplated in <u>Section
3.2(a)</u>.&#160; ADR costs under this <u>Section
3.2(c)</u> shall be borne fifty percent (50%) by GE and fifty percent (50%) by
Abbott, except that each party shall be responsible for its own expenses
(including legal expenses) and the costs of any witnesses selected by such
party.&#160; The place for such ADR shall be
Chicago, Illinois or at such other place as may be agreed upon by GE and
Abbott.</font></p>  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 3.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Closing Date Balance Sheet
Adjustment Amount Payment.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;Promptly (but not later than five (5)
days) after the completion of the Closing Date Balance Sheet Audit Report
pursuant to <u>Section 3.2(a)</u>, the parties shall determine whether the
Minimum Net Worth Amount exceeds the Net Worth reflected on the Closing Date
Balance Sheet (without, when making such determination, taking into account any
changes or adjustments resulting from the Bonus Amount, from the ordinary
course of the Business since the Performance Balance Sheet Date or from
material changes in GAAP that are effective after the Performance Balance Sheet
Date and prior to the Closing Date (i.e., ordinary course changes to the
Business and material changes in GAAP shall not result in a Closing Date
Balance Sheet Adjustment Amount)). Abbott shall pay to GE, by wire transfer of immediately
available funds to such bank account of GE as GE shall designate in writing to
Abbott, an amount equal to any such excess, plus interest on such excess from
the Closing Date to the date of payment thereof at the Agreed Rate (the &#147;<u>Closing
Date Balance Sheet Adjustment Amount</u>&#148;).</font></p>  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 3.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Purchase Price Allocation;
Withholding.</u></font></p>  <p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; No later than
fifteen (15) days after the date of this Agreement, Abbott shall provide GE
with (i) an allocation by country of the Closing Date Payment based on an
estimate of the fair market values of the Purchased Assets (less the Assumed
Liabilities) and</font></p>  <p style="margin:12.0pt 0pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">18</font></p>
</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='18',FILE='C:\fc\319115751_D11905_1658493\1583-2-ki.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Jan 31 09:11 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>


<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">the
covenant not to compete described in <u>Section 7.13</u> (the &#147;<u>Estimated
Country Allocation</u>&#148;) and (ii) if required by applicable Law (and only to
the extent required), an allocation by asset category of the Estimated Country
Allocation within a particular country (the &#147;<u>Estimated In-Country Allocation</u>&#148;).&#160; Within forty-five (45) days after Abbott
provides such allocations, but in no event later than thirty (30) days prior to
the Closing Date, Abbott and GE shall negotiate in good faith and attempt to
agree upon the Estimated Country Allocation and Estimated In-Country
Allocation.&#160; If, within that period,
Abbott and GE are unable to agree on the Estimated Country Allocation or
Estimated In-Country Allocation, the unresolved allocations in those countries
where applicable Law requires Abbott and GE to agree on an allocation either
prior to the Closing Date or at any date prior to the date of the Final Country
Allocation or Final In-Country Allocation shall be determined by Ernst &amp;
Young LLP or another internationally-recognized independent accounting firm or
appraisal firm mutually selected by Abbott and GE (the &#147;<u>Allocation Firm</u>&#148;)
using customary valuation methodologies; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that
the Allocation Firm shall make its determination no later than five (5) days
prior to the Closing Date.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; As soon as
practicable after the Closing Date Balance Sheet Adjustment Amount (if
applicable) and the Assumed Liabilities are determined, but in no event later
than forty-five (45) days thereafter, Abbott and GE shall, with respect to each
country for which an Estimated Country Allocation or Estimated In-Country
Allocation was agreed to by Abbott and GE or determined by the Allocation
Firm,&#160; negotiate in good faith and
attempt to agree upon an allocation of the final Purchase Price (including the
Assumed Liabilities) to the Purchased Assets&#160;
and covenant not to compete described in <u>Section 7.13</u> by country
and by asset category within that country.&#160;
Such allocations shall be based upon the Estimated Country Allocation
and Estimated In-Country Allocation agreed to by Abbott and GE or determined by
the Allocation Firm, as the case may be, as appropriately adjusted to reflect
the Closing Date Balance Sheet Adjustment Amount (if applicable), the Assumed
Liabilities and any other information that has become available since the
determination of the Estimated Country Allocation and Estimated In-Country
Allocation.&#160;&#160; If Abbott and GE are unable
to agree on such allocations, the unresolved allocations in those countries
where applicable Law requires Abbott and GE to agree on an allocation shall be
determined by the Allocation Firm using customary valuation methodologies
within thirty (30) days following the submission of the dispute to it.&#160; Any allocation agreed to by Abbott and GE
under this <u>Section 3.4(b)</u> or determined by the Allocation Firm is
hereafter referred to as the &#147;<u>Final Country Allocation</u>&#148; (in the case of
an allocation by country) and &#147;<u>Final In-Country Allocation</u>&#148; (in the case
of an allocation by asset category).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Any determination
made by the Allocation Firm shall be, absent manifest error, final and binding
on GE, on behalf of itself and its Affiliates, and Abbott, on behalf of itself
and its Affiliates.&#160; The fees and
expenses of the Allocation Firm shall be shared equally between Abbott and GE.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Each of
Abbott, GE and each of their respective Affiliates shall (i) be bound by the
Final Country Allocation and the Final In-Country Allocation for purposes of
determining Taxes and (ii) prepare and file, and cause its Affiliates to
prepare and file, its Tax Returns on a basis consistent with the Final Country
Allocation and the Final In-Country Allocation.&#160;
None of Abbott, GE or their respective Affiliates shall take any
position inconsistent with the Final Country Allocation or the Final In-Country
Allocation in any Tax Return, in any</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='19',FILE='C:\fc\32135426254_D10466_1663814\1583-2-kk.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb  1 13:54 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">refund
claim, in any litigation, or otherwise unless required by a final determination
by an applicable taxing authority.&#160; A
Final Country Allocation and Final In-Country Allocation shall only be required
where applicable Law requires Abbott and GE to agree upon such an allocation
(and only to the extent so required).&#160; In
all other cases, if Abbott and GE are unable to agree upon an allocation in
good faith, each party shall be entitled to follow its own allocation (without
regard to the other party&#146;s allocation).&#160;
Notwithstanding the preceding two sentences, if (i) a payment may be
required to be made from Abbott to GE or from GE to Abbott under this
Agreement, (ii) the amount of such payment is dependant upon an allocation of
the Purchase Price and (iii) the parties cannot agree upon such allocation,
then solely for purposes of determining the amount of such payment, dispute
resolution mechanisms similar to those described in this <u>Section 3.4</u> shall
be used to determine the allocation necessary to determine the amount of such
payment.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Within ten
(10) days following the date of this Agreement, Abbott shall deliver to GE a
list setting forth, for each jurisdiction in which Abbott or its Affiliates
have Purchased Assets, the complete company name and other necessary
information of Abbott or its designated Affiliates that shall sell the
Purchased Assets. Within twenty-five (25) days of its receipt of Abbott&#146;s list
pursuant to the preceding sentence, GE shall deliver to Abbott a list setting
forth for each jurisdiction where Abbott or its designated Affiliates have
Purchased Assets, the complete company name and other necessary information of
GE or its designated Affiliates that shall acquire the Purchased Assets in each
relevant jurisdiction.&#160; Such list shall
be amended as necessary to reflect changes occurring prior to the Closing Date.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(f)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; GE shall
make any required withholding of Taxes from the Purchase Price and shall pay
Abbott the Purchase Price net of any such withholding.&#160; Except as otherwise provided in this
Agreement, GE shall have no obligation to gross-up, indemnify or otherwise
compensate Abbott for any withholding Tax due or imposed with respect to the
Purchase Price to the extent required by applicable Law.&#160; No later than five (5) days prior to the
Closing, GE shall provide <u>Schedule 3.4(f)</u> to Abbott which shall set
forth the jurisdictions in which any of GE or any of its Affiliates is
obligated to withhold Taxes on payment of the Purchase Price.&#160; Abbott shall reasonably cooperate with GE to
enable GE to determine its withholding obligation.&#160; GE shall reasonably cooperate with Abbott in
obtaining any exemption or reduction in withholding Tax to which Abbott or any
of its Affiliates is entitled under applicable Law.</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE
4</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">CLOSING</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 4.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Closing Date.</u></font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Subject to
the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the sale and purchase of the
Purchased Assets and the assumption of the Assumed Liabilities contemplated by
this Agreement shall take place at a closing (the &#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Closing</u></font>&#148;)
to be held at the offices of Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher &amp; Flom LLP, 333
West Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60606, at 10:00 a.m. Chicago time, on the
later of (i) April 2, 2007, or (ii) the third (3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">rd</font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">)</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">20</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='20',FILE='C:\fc\32135426254_D10466_1663814\1583-2-kk.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb  1 13:54 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Business
Day following the satisfaction or waiver of each of the conditions set forth in
<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Article 10</u></font> or at such other place, time or
date as Abbott and GE may mutually agree in writing (the &#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Closing Date</u></font>&#148;), <font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>provided,</u></font>
<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>that</u></font>, in the event (a) any Consent of a
Governmental Authority required in any jurisdiction (other than a Consent of a
Governmental Authority required for the consummation of the transactions
contemplated by this Agreement under the Competition/Investment Laws of the
jurisdictions listed in <u>Section 10.1(b)</u> or on <u>Schedule 10.1(b)</u>)
has not been obtained at the time of the Closing, (b) any Governmental
Authority in any jurisdiction (other than a Major Jurisdiction or the European
Union) shall have enacted, issued, promulgated, enforced or entered any
Governmental Order (whether temporary, preliminary or permanent) that has the
effect of making the transactions contemplated by this Agreement illegal or
otherwise prohibiting the consummation of such transactions in such
jurisdiction that is continuing as of the Closing Date or (c) any notification,
or where appropriate, consultation, consent or negotiation with a works
council, union, labor board or similar Government Authority concerning the
transactions contemplated by this Agreement which is required in any jurisdiction
(other than a Major Jurisdiction) has not been completed at the time of the
Closing (each, a &#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Deferred Closing Jurisdiction</u></font>&#148;),
then the parties shall defer (to the extent allowed by applicable Laws) the
Closing solely with respect to the Purchased Assets related to such Deferred
Closing Jurisdiction (each, a &#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Deferred Local Closing</u></font><font style="text-decoration:underline;"><font style="text-decoration:none;">&#148;)</font></font>.&#160; In such event, (a) the legal interest in and
to the relevant Purchased Assets shall not be assigned, transferred or conveyed
to GE or the applicable Affiliate of GE unless and until the Deferred Local
Closing occurs, (b) the parties shall use their commercially reasonable efforts
to obtain such Consents, resolve such Governmental Orders and cause the
expiration of all mandatory waiting periods as soon as practicable, (c) to the
extent permitted under applicable Law, GE or the applicable Affiliate of GE,
shall acquire beneficial interest in and to the relevant Purchased Assets at
the Closing (including all cash and cash equivalents generated with respect
thereto), (d) to the extent permitted under applicable Law, until the Deferred
Local Closing occurs, Abbott and its Affiliates shall conduct the Business in
each Deferred Closing Jurisdiction in accordance with GE&#146;s instructions for the
benefit and at the expense of GE or its applicable Affiliate and (e) neither
Abbott nor any of its Affiliates shall have any Liability to GE or any of its
Affiliates arising out of the management or operation of the Business in any
Deferred Closing Jurisdictions other than for gross negligence or willful
misconduct.&#160; Each Deferred Local Closing
shall occur no later than three (3) Business Days following receipt of the
necessary Consent, the expiration of all mandatory waiting periods and
resolution of all applicable Governmental Orders, or at such time as the
parties may mutually agree upon in writing.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The parties
hereby agree and acknowledge that the Closing shall be effective in each
jurisdiction where Abbott and its Affiliates conduct the Business (i) as of
12:01 a.m. local time on April 1, 2007 if the date of the Closing is April 2,
2007, (ii) as of 12:01 a.m. local time on the date of the Closing if the date
of the Closing is a day other than April 2, 2007 or (iii) if required by
mandatory applicable Laws, as of 12:01 a.m. local time on the date of the
Deferred Local Closing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 4.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Closing Deliveries by Abbott.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;At
the Closing, Abbott shall deliver, or cause to be delivered, to GE or the
applicable Affiliate of GE:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; copies of the
resolutions (or local equivalent) of the board of directors (or local
equivalent) and, where required, the stockholders, of each Affiliate of Abbott,</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">21</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">authorizing
and approving the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and the
applicable Ancillary Agreements, to the extent applicable to such Affiliate, certified
by the respective corporate secretary (or local equivalent) or a director to be
true and complete and in full force and effect and unmodified as of the
Closing;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; executed
counterparts of each Conveyance and Assumption Instrument to which Abbott or
the applicable Affiliate of Abbott is a party (other than Conveyance and
Assumption Instruments relating to any Deferred Local Closings which shall be
delivered at the date of the relevant Deferred Local Closing);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; executed
counterparts of the Transition Services Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; a receipt for
the Closing Date Payment less any amounts withheld pursuant to <u>Section
3.4(f)</u> or that must be paid locally to the applicable Affiliate of Abbott
pursuant to applicable Law, in which case Abbott or the applicable Affiliate of
Abbott shall deliver to the applicable Affiliate of GE a receipt for the
portion of the Closing Date Payment allocated to the relevant jurisdiction
pursuant to <font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Section 3.4</u></font>; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the
certificate required by <u>Section 10.2(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 4.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Closing Deliveries by GE.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;At
the Closing, GE shall deliver, or cause to be delivered, to Abbott or the
applicable Affiliate of Abbott:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the Closing
Date Payment less any amounts withheld pursuant to <u>Section 3.4(f)</u>, by
wire transfer in immediately available funds to an account or accounts
designated in writing by Abbott not fewer than three (3) Business Days prior to
the Closing (except as otherwise may be required by applicable Law, in which
case the portion of the Closing Date Payment that must be paid locally to the
applicable Affiliate of Abbott shall be paid by wire transfer in immediately
available funds (in the local currency, if required by applicable Law) to a
local bank account of such Affiliate of Abbott designated in writing by Abbott
no fewer than three (3) Business Days prior to the Closing);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; copies of the
resolutions (or local equivalent) of the board of directors (or local
equivalent) and, where required, the stockholders, of each Affiliate of GE,
authorizing and approving the transactions contemplated by this Agreement and
the Ancillary Agreements, to the extent applicable to such Affiliate, certified
by the respective corporate secretary (or local equivalent) or a director to be
true and complete and in full force and effect and unmodified as of the
Closing;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; executed
counterparts of each Conveyance and Assumption Instrument to which GE or the
applicable Affiliate of GE is a party (other than Conveyance and Assumption
Instruments relating to any Deferred Local Closings which shall be delivered at
the date of the relevant Deferred Local Closing);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; executed
counterparts of the Transition Services Agreement; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(e)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the
certificate required by <u>Section 10.1(a)</u>.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='22',FILE='C:\fc\32135426254_D10466_1663814\1583-2-kk.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb  1 13:54 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE
5</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">REPRESENTATIONS
AND WARRANTIES OF ABBOTT</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:38.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except
as otherwise set forth in a schedule to any particular representation and
warranty (collectively, the &#147;<u>Company Disclosure Schedule</u>&#148;) (with
specific reference to the particular Section of this Agreement to which the
information set forth in such disclosure schedule relates; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>,
that any information set forth in one Section of the Company Disclosure
Schedule shall be deemed to apply to each other Section thereof to which its
relevance is readily apparent on its face), </font>Abbott represents and
warrants to GE as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 5.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Performance Financial Statements.</u></font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Set
forth on <u>Schedule 5.1(a)</u> are the (i) unaudited performance balance
sheets and unaudited performance profit and loss statements of the Abbott
Diagnostics Division Business as of and for the years ended December 31, 2005
and December 31, 2004 and as of and for the nine (9) months ended on the
Performance Balance Sheet Date (collectively, the &#147;<u>Abbott Diagnostics
Division Performance Financial Statements</u>&#148;) and (ii) unaudited performance
balance sheets, and unaudited performance profit and loss statements of the
Abbott Point of Care Business as of and for the years ended December 31, 2005
and December 31, 2004 and as of and for the nine (9) months ended on the
Performance Balance Sheet Date (collectively, the &#147;<u>Abbott Point of Care
Performance Financial Statements</u>&#148; and together with the Abbott Diagnostics
Division Performance Financial Statements, the &#147;<u>Performance Financial
Statements</u>&#148;).&#160; Except as set forth on
<u>Schedule 5.1(a)</u>, the Performance Financial Statements have been prepared
in accordance with GAAP and fairly present in all material respects the
financial condition and results of operations of the Business as of the
respective dates thereof and for the periods referred to therein.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman"><font style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Set
forth on <u>Schedule 5.1(b)</u> </font>is a schedule that accurately reflects
in all material respects the additions to service equipment, net of
reserves/retirements for refurbishments, for the years ended December 31, 2005
and December 31, 2004 and for the nine (9) months ended on the Performance
Balance Sheet Date, without capitalized interest thereon, and for instrument
refurbishment additions, in accordance with Abbott&#146;s accounting policies for
additions to service equipment and instrument refurbishment costs, which
policies were provided by Abbott to GE prior to the date of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 5.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Sufficiency of Assets.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;Assuming
all required consents of third Persons (including as contemplated by <u>Section
7.8</u>) are obtained and alternative arrangements contemplated by <u>Section
7.8(b)</u> or <u>Schedule 7.8(b)</u> are performed, the Purchased Assets
delivered at Closing (taking into account the effect of any Deferred Local
Closing, the Delayed PR Closing and the implementation of the alternative
arrangements contemplated by <u>Section 7.8(b)</u> or <u>Schedule 7.8(b)</u>), together
with the Intellectual Property to be provided under <u>Section 7.6(a)</u> and <u>Section
7.6(b)</u>, the services to be provided under the Transition Services Agreement
and the services and assets to be provided by Abbott or its Affiliates under
any other Ancillary Agreements constitute all of the assets necessary to
operate and conduct the Business in all material respects in the manner as is
now being conducted by Abbott and its Affiliates.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">23</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='23',FILE='C:\fc\32135426254_D10466_1663814\1583-2-kk.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb  1 13:54 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Title.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;</font>Each
of Abbott and its Affiliates has valid title to, or valid leasehold or sublease
interests or other comparable Contract rights in or relating to, all of its
Owned Business Real Property or Leased Business Real Property, as applicable,
and other tangible Purchased Assets, except as have been disposed of in the
ordinary course of business and except for Permitted Encumbrances.&#160; Each of Abbott and its Affiliates has
complied in all material respects with the terms of all material leases or
material subleases relating to Leased Business Real Property to which it is a
party and under which it is in occupancy, and all leases relating to Leased
Business Real Property to which Abbott or its Affiliates is a party and under
which it is in occupancy are in full force and effect.&#160; None of Abbott or its Affiliates has received
any written notice of any event or occurrence that has resulted or could result
(with or without the giving of notice, the lapse of time or both) in a material
default with respect to any material lease or material sublease regarding the
Leased Business Real Property to which it is a party.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 5.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Environmental Matters.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;</font>Except
for those matters that individually or in the aggregate have not had and would
not reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect: (i) during the
period of ownership or operation by Abbott and its Affiliates of any of their
current Owned Business Real Property or Leased Business Real Property, there
have been no releases of Hazardous Materials in, on, under or affecting any
properties that would subject the Business to any Liability under Environmental
Laws or require expenditures by the Business for remediation to meet applicable
standards thereunder; (ii) prior to the period of ownership or operation by
Abbott and its Affiliates of any of their current Owned Business Real Property
or Leased Business Real Property, to the Knowledge of Abbott, there were no
releases of Hazardous Materials in, on, under or affecting any properties that
would subject the Business to any Liability under any Environmental Law or
require any expenditure by the Business for remediation to meet applicable
standards thereunder; (iii) none of Abbott or any of its Affiliates with
respect to the Business is subject to any indemnity obligation or Contract with
any Person relating to Liabilities under Environmental Laws; and (iv) to the
Knowledge of Abbott, there are no facts, circumstances or conditions that would
reasonably be expected to form the basis for any Action, or Liability against
or affecting the Business relating to or arising under Environmental Laws.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 5.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Organization, Authority and
Qualification.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;Abbott is a corporation duly incorporated,
validly existing and in good standing under the Laws of the State of Illinois
and has all necessary corporate power and authority to enter into, execute and
deliver this Agreement, to carry out its obligations hereunder and to
consummate the transactions contemplated hereby.&#160; The execution and delivery of this Agreement
by Abbott, the performance by Abbott of its obligations hereunder and the
consummation by Abbott of the transactions contemplated hereby have been duly
authorized by all requisite corporate action on the part of Abbott.&#160; This Agreement has been duly executed and
delivered by Abbott, and, assuming due authorization, execution and delivery by
GE, this Agreement is a legal, valid and binding obligation of Abbott,
enforceable against it in accordance with its terms.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 5.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>No Conflict.</u>&nbsp;&nbsp;</font>Assuming
that all Consents and other actions described in <u>Section 5.7</u> have been
obtained, the execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement by Abbott
do not and shall not (a) violate, conflict with or result in the breach of the
certificate of incorporation or bylaws of Abbott, (b) conflict with or violate
any Law or Governmental Order applicable to Abbott or its properties or the
Purchased Assets or (c) conflict with, result in any</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">24</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">
