<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE
11</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">TERMINATION</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 11.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Termination.</u>&#160; This Agreement may be terminated at any time
prior to the Closing in the following circumstances:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; by the mutual
written consent of Abbott and GE;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; by either
Abbott or GE by written notice to the other, if the Closing shall not have
occurred by July 18, 2007 (the &#147;<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Outside Date</u></font>&#148;);
<font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>provided</u></font><font style="text-decoration:underline;"><font style="text-decoration:none;">, </font>however,</font> that either
Abbott or GE may, in its sole discretion, by written notice to the other elect
to extend the Outside Date for one (1) ninety (90) day extension period if the
Closing has not occurred due to the failure of the condition set forth in <u>Section
10.1(b)</u>, in the case of Abbott, or the condition set forth in <u>Section
10.2(b)</u>, in the case of GE; <font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>provided</u></font>  <font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>further</u></font>  <u>that</u>, the right to terminate this
Agreement under this <font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Section 11.1(b)</u></font> shall
not be available to any party whose failure to fulfill any obligation under
this Agreement shall have been the cause of, or shall have resulted in, the
failure of the Closing to occur on or prior to such date; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; by either
Abbott or GE by written notice to the other in the event that any Governmental
Order of any Governmental Authority in a Major Jurisdiction or the European
Union restraining, enjoining or otherwise prohibiting the transactions
contemplated by this Agreement in such jurisdiction shall have become final and
non-appealable.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 11.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Effect of Termination</u>.&#160; In the event of termination of this Agreement
as provided in <u>Section 11.1</u>, this Agreement shall forthwith become void
and there shall be no liability on the part of either party hereto except (a)
as set forth in <u>Section 7.2</u> and <u>Article 13</u> and (b) that nothing
herein shall relieve either party from liability for any willful breach of this
Agreement occurring prior to such termination.</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE
12</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">INDEMNIFICATION
AND SURVIVAL</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 12.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Survival of Representations and
Warranties</u>.&#160; The representations and
warranties contained in <u>Section 5.1</u> (Performance Financial Statements), <u>Section
5.2</u> (Sufficiency of Assets), <u>Section 5.3</u> (Title), <u>Section 5.4</u>
(Environmental Matters) and <u>Section 5.11</u> (Fraud and Abuse Statutes) and
the covenants and obligations of the parties hereto contained in this Agreement
shall survive the consummation of the transactions contemplated by this
Agreement as provided in this <u>Article 12</u>.&#160; Except as provided in the immediately
preceding sentence, the representations and warranties of the parties hereto
contained in this Agreement shall terminate at the Closing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 12.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Indemnification by Abbott</u>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Abbott&#146;s
Indemnity</u>.&#160; From and after the
Closing, Abbott shall indemnify and hold harmless GE and its Affiliates,
officers, directors, agents, successors and </font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">66</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='66',FILE='C:\fc\52144734359_D11189_1741964\1583-2-ks.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 21 14:47 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">assigns
(the &#147;<u>GE Indemnified Parties</u>&#148;) from and against all losses, Liabilities,
costs and expenses (including reasonable attorneys&#146; fees) (collectively, &#147;<u>Losses</u>&#148;)
which GE or its Affiliates may actually suffer or incur to the extent arising
out of or related to:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 36.0pt 12.0pt 0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160; the Excluded
Liabilities;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160; Taxes,
Conveyance Taxes and any other amounts for which Abbott is liable pursuant to <u>Article
9</u>; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that Abbott shall not be liable for any
Losses related to Taxes described in <u>Section 9.1(a)(i)</u> or <u>(ii)</u>
(other than such Taxes themselves) for which GE or its Affiliates are
responsible for filing the applicable Tax Return, except to the extent such Losses
arise out of the action or inaction of Abbott or any of its Affiliates;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&#160; failure
by Abbott or any of its Affiliates to perform any of their covenants or
agreements contained in this Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)&#160; any
inaccuracies in or breaches by Abbott, specifically identified by GE as
Environmental Conditions pursuant to <u>Section 7.14(a)(ii)</u> within thirty
(30) days after the Environmental Review Commencement Date, of the
representations and warranties contained in <u>Section 5.4</u> (considered for
these purposes, disregarding any qualification or exception contained in any
such representation or warranty relating to materiality or Material Adverse
Effect) (unless GE shall have exercised its option under clause (1) or (2) of <u>Section
7.14(a)(ii)</u>);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(v)&#160;&#160; any
inaccuracies in or breaches by Abbott of the representations and warranties
contained in <u>Section 5.11</u> (considered for these purposes, disregarding
any qualification or exception contained in any such representation or warranty
relating to materiality or Material Adverse Effect) (A) that are specifically
identified by GE in writing within thirty (30) days after the date of this
Agreement in a notice that identifies the specific practices or condition that
give rise to such inaccuracy or breach and provides an undertaking by GE that
it shall not continue such practice or condition after Closing, (B) that are
first discovered by, or made to known to, GE after the date of this Agreement,
(C) that Abbott is unable to remedy prior to the Closing and (D) with respect
to which the practices or conditions giving rise to such inaccuracy or breach
are not reasonably expected to be continued by GE after Closing (if after the
Closing, GE does continue such practices or conditions giving rise to such
inaccuracy or breach, Abbott shall not be required to indemnify GE for such
inaccuracy or breach or, if Abbott has previously indemnified GE with respect
thereto, GE shall be required to reimburse Abbott for the amount of such
indemnification payment); or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)&#160; any
inaccuracies in or breaches by Abbott of the representations and warranties
contained in <u>Sections 5.1</u>, <u>5.2</u> or <u>5.3</u> (considered for
these purposes (other than with respect to <u>Section 5.1</u>), disregarding
any qualification or exception contained in any such representation or warranty
relating to materiality or Material Adverse Effect);</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">67</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='67',FILE='C:\fc\52144734359_D11189_1741964\1583-2-ks.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 21 14:47 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and, in each such case,
for which GE gives Abbott written notice of a claim for reimbursement following
Closing in accordance with <u>Section 12.2(b)</u> (a &#147;<u>GE Claim</u>&#148;);<b>  </b><u>provided</u> that with respect to indemnification by
Abbott for any GE Claim (X) pursuant to <u>Sections 12.2(a)(iv), (v)</u> and <u>(vi)</u>,
Abbott shall not be liable unless the aggregate amount of Losses for all GE
Claims under <u>Sections 12.2(a)(iv), (v)</u> or <u>(vi)</u> exceeds
$100,000,000 less the amount of any reimbursement by GE for Response Costs
pursuant to <u>Section 7.14(a)(ii)</u> and then only to the extent of such
excess and (Y) Abbott&#146;s maximum liability for GE Claims under <u>Sections
12.2(a)(iv)</u>, <u>(v)</u> and <u>(vi)</u> shall not exceed $600,000,000 in
the aggregate, less the amount of any Response Costs incurred by Abbott
pursuant to <u>Section 7.14(a)(ii)</u> (it being understood that, with respect
to a breach of the warranty or inaccuracy of the representations contained in <u>Section
5.1</u>, the term &#147;in all material respects&#148; shall be disregarded in
determining the amount of Losses incurred by any GE Indemnified Party in
connection therewith or arising therefrom).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Notice of
Claims</u>.&#160; Any GE Indemnified Party
seeking indemnification under <u>Section 12.2(a)</u> shall provide a notice to
Abbott in writing describing in reasonable detail the facts giving rise to any
claim for indemnification and the amount sought to be reimbursed; <u>provided</u>
that, such notice shall be given promptly following the assertion of any
Third-Party Claim, or the commencement of any Action, in respect of which
indemnity may be sought under <u>Section 12.2(a)</u> and such GE Indemnified
Party shall provide Abbott such information (if then known) with respect
thereto that Abbott may reasonably request; <u>provided</u> that Abbott shall have
no Liability with respect to any claim for indemnification pursuant to <u>Section
12.2(a)</u> for which Abbott did not promptly receive written notice from such
GE Indemnified Party, to the extent Abbott shall have been prejudiced thereby;
and <u>provided</u>  <u>further</u>, that Abbott shall have no Liability with
respect to any claim for indemnification pursuant to (x) clause (iv) of <u>Section
12.2(a)</u> for which Abbott did not receive such specific written notice from
GE within thirty (30) days after the applicable Environmental Review
Commencement Date, (y) clause (v) of <u>Section 12.2(a)</u> for which Abbott
did not receive such specific written notice from GE within thirty (30) days
after the date of this Agreement&nbsp;or for which the Loss shall not have
occurred within eighteen (18) months after the Closing Date or (z) clause (vi)
of <u>Section 12.2(a)</u> for which Abbott did not receive such specific
written notice from GE within twelve (12) months after the Closing Date.&#160; No GE Indemnified Party shall admit any
Liability with respect to, or settle, compromise or discharge, any such matter
covered by this <u>Section 12.2</u> without Abbott&#146;s prior written consent
(which shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed).&#160; Subject to the immediately preceding
sentence, the GE Indemnified Party shall have the right, with the consent of
Abbott (which shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed), to settle all
indemnifiable matters related to Third-Party Claims which are susceptible to
being settled, and to defend (without the consent of Abbott) through counsel of
its own choosing any Action which may be brought by a third Person in
connection therewith; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that Abbott shall have
the right to have its counsel participate fully in such defense at its own
expense.&#160; GE and Abbott shall keep each
other reasonably informed of all settlement negotiations with third Persons
regarding the provisions hereof and of the progress of any litigation with
third Persons regarding the provisions hereof.&#160;
GE and Abbott shall permit each other reasonable access to books and
records and otherwise cooperate with all reasonable requests of each other in
connection with any indemnifiable matter resulting from a claim by a third
Person.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">68</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='68',FILE='C:\fc\52144734359_D11189_1741964\1583-2-ks.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 21 14:47 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 12.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Indemnification by GE.</u></font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>GE&#146;s
Indemnity</u>.&#160; From and after the Closing,
GE shall indemnify and hold harmless Abbott and its Affiliates, officers,
directors, agents, successors and assigns and, solely with respect to Losses
arising out of or related to the Consent Decree, any Abbott Consent Decree
Defendants that are not otherwise identified in this clause (a) above (all such
parties are collectively referred to as the &#147;<u>Abbott Indemnified Parties</u>&#148;)
from and against and in respect of all Losses which Abbott and its Affiliates
may actually suffer or incur to the extent arising out of or related to:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160; the
Assumed Liabilities (except to the extent GE is entitled to indemnification
with respect thereto pursuant to <u>Section 12.2(a)(iv)</u>, <u>(v)</u> or <u>(vi)</u>);</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)&#160;&#160; failure
by GE or any of its Affiliates to perform any of their covenants or agreements
contained in this Agreement;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)&#160; any
Liabilities arising from the operation of the Business on or after the Closing
(other than the Excluded Liabilities), and, in each such case, for which Abbott
gives GE written notice of a claim for reimbursement following Closing in
accordance with <u>Section 12.3(b)</u>; or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:162.0pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)&#160; Taxes,
Conveyance Taxes and any other amounts for which GE is liable pursuant to <u>Article
9</u>; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that GE shall not be liable for any
Losses related to Taxes described in <u>Section 9.1(b)</u> (other than such
Excluded Taxes themselves) except to the extent such Losses arise out of the
action or inaction of GE or any of its Affiliates.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Notice of
Claims</u>.&#160; Any Abbott Indemnified Party
seeking indemnification under <u>Section 12.3(a)</u> shall promptly upon
becoming aware of any such matters provide a notice to GE in writing describing
in reasonable detail the facts giving rise to any claim for indemnification; <u>provided</u>
that GE shall have no Liability with respect to any claim for indemnification
pursuant to <u>Section 12.3(a)</u> for which GE did not promptly receive
written notice from such Abbott Indemnified Party to the extent GE shall have
been prejudiced thereby.&#160; No Abbott
Indemnified Party shall admit any Liability with respect to, or settle,
compromise or discharge any such matter covered by this <u>Section 12.3</u>
without GE&#146;s prior written consent (which shall not be unreasonably withheld or
delayed).&#160; Subject to the immediately
preceding sentence, the Abbott Indemnified Party shall have the right, with the
consent of GE (which shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed), to settle
all indemnifiable matters related to Third-Party Claims which are susceptible
to being settled, and to defend (without the consent of GE) through counsel of
its own choosing, any Action which may be brought by a third Person in
connection therewith; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that GE shall have the
right to have its counsel participate fully in such defense at its own
expense.&#160; GE and Abbott shall keep each
other reasonably informed of all settlement negotiations with third Persons
regarding the provisions hereof and of the progress of any litigation with
third Persons regarding the provisions hereof.&#160;
GE and Abbott shall permit each other reasonable access to books and
records and otherwise cooperate with all reasonable requests of each other in
connection with any indemnifiable matter resulting from a claim by a third
Person.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">69</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='69',FILE='C:\fc\52144734359_D11189_1741964\1583-2-ks.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 21 14:47 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Exclusive Remedy</u>.&#160; Except as otherwise set forth in <u>Section
13.11</u> or as otherwise set forth in any Ancillary Agreement, from and after
the Closing, the rights and remedies set forth in this <u>Article 12</u> shall
constitute the sole and exclusive rights and remedies of GE and Abbott with
respect to this Agreement, the events giving rise to this Agreement and the
transactions contemplated hereby.&#160;
Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, neither party shall
have any rights to set-off indemnifiable Losses pursuant to this <u>Article 12</u>
against other obligations owed to the other party.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 12.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Calculation of Damages</u>.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notwithstanding
anything to the contrary contained in this Agreement, neither party shall have
Liability under or in connection with any claim for indemnification pursuant to
this <u>Article 12</u> for any claim (i) for punitive, incidental,
consequential, lost profits, special or indirect damages or (ii) with respect
to claims made by a GE Indemnified Party, to the extent such claim is reserved
as a dollar amount on the Closing Date Balance Sheet.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Notwithstanding
anything contained herein to the contrary, the amount of any Losses incurred or
suffered by a GE Indemnified Party or an Abbott Indemnified Party entitled to
indemnification hereunder pursuant to <u>Section 12.2(a)</u> or <u>Section
12.3(a)</u>, as applicable, shall be calculated after giving effect to: (i) any
insurance proceeds received by such Person (or any of its Affiliates) with
respect to such Losses; (ii) any Tax benefit or detriment actually realized by
such Person (or any of its Affiliates) arising from the facts or circumstances
giving rise to such Losses or from receipt of the indemnity payment; and (iii)
any recoveries obtained by such Person (or any of its Affiliates) from any
other third Person.&#160; Each such Person
shall exercise its commercially reasonable efforts to obtain such proceeds,
benefits and recoveries.&#160; If any such
proceeds, benefits or recoveries are received by such Person (or any of its
Affiliates) with respect to any Losses after such Person (or any Affiliate) has
received the benefit of any indemnification hereunder with respect thereto,
such Person (or such Affiliate) shall pay to the party providing such
indemnification the amount of such proceeds, benefits or recoveries, less such
Person&#146;s expenses (up to the amount of the indemnification payment).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:129.6pt;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Abbott shall
not be liable under <u>Section 12.2</u> for any Losses (nor shall any such
Losses reduce the $100,000,000 deductible provided in clause (x) of the last
paragraph of <u>Section 12.2(a)</u>) relating to any matter to the extent that
any GE Indemnified Party was reimbursed for such Losses pursuant to the
purchase price adjustment set forth in <u>Section 3.3</u> or would have been
reimbursed for such Losses pursuant to such adjustment if the Minimum Net Worth
Amount used in calculating such adjustment was $2,078,228,000.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 12.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Tax Treatment of Indemnity Payments</u>.&#160; For all Tax purposes, the parties agree to
treat all payments made under any indemnity provisions contained in this
Agreement as adjustments to the Purchase Price, except to the extent applicable
Law requires otherwise.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">70</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='70',FILE='C:\fc\52144734359_D11189_1741964\1583-2-ks.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 21 14:47 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE
13</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">MISCELLANEOUS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.1&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Assignment</u>.&#160; This Agreement shall be binding upon and
inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and
assigns; <u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that no assignment shall be made by
either party without the prior written consent of the other party.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, either party
may assign its rights and obligations under this Agreement without such consent
to an Affiliate or in connection with a sale, merger or other transaction
involving a transfer of substantially all of its assets; <u>provided</u>  <u>that</u>,
such assigning party shall remain primarily liable for its obligations
hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.2&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Public Announcements</u>.&#160; Neither party shall issue nor make any public
announcement, press release or other public disclosure regarding this Agreement
or its subject matter without the other party&#146;s prior written consent, except
for any such disclosure that is, in the opinion of the disclosing party&#146;s
counsel, required by applicable Law or the rules of a stock exchange on which
the securities of the disclosing party are listed.&#160; In the event a party is, in the opinion of
its counsel, required to make a public disclosure by applicable Law or the
rules of a stock exchange on which its securities are listed, such party shall,
to the extent practicable, submit the proposed disclosure in writing to the
other party prior to the date of disclosure and provide the other party a
reasonable opportunity to comment thereon.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.3&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Expenses</u>.&#160; Whether or not the transactions contemplated
hereby are consummated, and except as otherwise specified herein, each party
shall bear its own expenses with respect to the transactions contemplated by
this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.4&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Severability</u>.&#160; Each of the provisions contained in this
Agreement shall be severable, and the unenforceability of one shall not affect
the enforceability of any others or of the remainder of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.5&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>No Third Party Beneficiaries</u>.&#160; Except in respect of a GE Indemnified Party
or Abbott Indemnified Party who is not a party hereto, this Agreement is for
the sole benefit of the parties hereto and their permitted assigns and nothing
herein, express or implied, shall give or be construed to give to any Person,
other than the parties hereto and such permitted assigns, any legal or
equitable rights hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.6&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Waiver.</u>&#160; The failure of any party to enforce any
condition or part of this Agreement at any time shall not be construed as a
waiver of that condition or part, nor shall it forfeit any rights to future
enforcement thereof.&#160; Any waiver
hereunder shall be effective only if delivered to the other party hereto in
writing by the party making such waiver.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.7&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Governing Law</u>.&#160; This Agreement shall be construed and
enforced in accordance with and governed by the Laws of the State of Delaware
without regard to the conflicts of Laws provisions thereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.8&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Alternative Dispute Resolution</u>.&#160; The parties recognize that from time to time
a dispute may arise (a) relating to negotiation and finalization of the
Ancillary Agreements (b) with respect to determinations of (i) whether a
particular asset is a Purchased Asset or an</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">71</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='71',FILE='C:\fc\52144734359_D11189_1741964\1583-2-ks.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 21 14:47 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Excluded Asset, a particular Liability is an Assumed
Liability or an Excluded Liability or any Mixed-Use Intellectual Property
constitutes GE Mixed-Use Intellectual Property or Abbott Mixed-Use Intellectual
Property, (ii) indemnification payments pursuant to this Agreement or (c) with
respect to interpretations of provisions of this Agreement or the Ancillary
Agreements.&#160; The parties agree that any
such dispute shall be exclusively resolved by the ADR provisions set forth on <u>Schedule
13.8</u>, the result of which shall be binding upon the parties.&#160; The place for such ADR shall be Chicago,
Illinois or at such other place as may be agreed upon by GE and Abbott.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.9&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Jurisdiction</u>.&#160; The parties hereto agree that any Action
seeking to enforce any provision of, or based on any matter arising out of or
in connection with, this Agreement or the transactions contemplated hereby
(other than those matters to be exclusively resolved pursuant to the ADR
provisions referred to in <font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Section 13.8</u></font>)
shall be brought in the United States District Court located in Wilmington,
Delaware so long as such court shall have subject matter jurisdiction over such
Action, or alternatively in the Delaware State Court located in Wilmington,
Delaware if the aforesaid United States District Court does not have subject
matter jurisdiction, and that any cause of action arising out of this Agreement
shall be deemed to have arisen from a transaction of business in the State of
Delaware, and each of the parties hereby irrevocably consents to the
jurisdiction of such court (and of the appropriate appellate courts therefrom)
in any such Action and irrevocably waives, to the fullest extent permitted by
Law, any objection that it may now or hereafter have to the laying of the venue
of any such Action in any such court or that any such Action which is brought
in such court has been brought in an inconvenient forum.&#160; Process in any such Action may be served on any
party anywhere in the world, whether within or without the jurisdiction of such
court.&#160; Without limiting the foregoing,
each party agrees that service of process on such party as provided in <font style="text-decoration:underline;"><u>Section 13.15</u></font> shall be deemed effective service
of process on such party.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.10&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Waiver of Jury Trial</u>.&#160; EACH OF THE PARTIES HERETO WAIVES TO THE
FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW ANY RIGHT IT MAY HAVE TO A TRIAL BY
JURY WITH RESPECT TO ANY LITIGATION DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY ARISING OUT OF,
UNDER OR IN CONNECTION WITH THIS AGREEMENT OR THE TRANSACTIONS CONTEMPLATED BY
THIS AGREEMENT.&#160; EACH OF THE PARTIES
HERETO HEREBY (A) CERTIFIES THAT NO REPRESENTATIVE, AGENT OR ATTORNEY OF THE
OTHER PARTY HAS REPRESENTED, EXPRESSLY OR OTHERWISE, THAT SUCH OTHER PARTY
WOULD NOT, IN THE EVENT OF LITIGATION, SEEK TO ENFORCE THE FOREGOING WAIVER,
AND (B) ACKNOWLEDGES THAT IT HAS BEEN INDUCED TO ENTER INTO THIS AGREEMENT AND
THE TRANSACTIONS CONTEMPLATED BY THIS AGREEMENT, AS APPLICABLE, BY, AMONG OTHER
THINGS, THE MUTUAL WAIVERS AND CERTIFICATIONS IN THIS <u>SECTION 13.10</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.11&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Specific Performance</u>.&#160; The parties acknowledge that, in view of the
uniqueness of the Business, the Purchased Assets and the transactions
contemplated by this Agreement, each party would not have an adequate remedy at
Law for money damages in the event that this Agreement has not been performed
in accordance with its terms, and therefore agrees that the other party shall
be entitled to specific enforcement of the terms hereof in addition to any
other remedy to which it may be entitled (in accordance with <u>Section 13.9</u>),
at Law or in equity and <u>Section 13.8</u> shall not apply to any such
specific enforcement.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">72</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.12&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Headings</u>.&#160; The headings of the sections and subsections
of this Agreement are inserted for convenience only and shall not be deemed to
constitute a part hereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.13&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Counterparts</u>.&#160; The parties may execute this Agreement in one
or more counterparts, and each fully executed counterpart shall be deemed an
original.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.14&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Further Documents</u>.&#160; Each of GE and Abbott shall, and shall cause
its respective Affiliates to, at the request of the other party, execute and
deliver to such other party all such further instruments, assignments,
assurances and other documents as such other party may reasonably request in
connection with the carrying out of this Agreement and the transactions
contemplated hereby.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.15&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Notices</u>.&#160; All communications, notices and Consents
provided for herein shall be in writing and be given in person or by means of
telex, facsimile or other means of wire transmission (with request for
assurance of receipt in a manner typical with respect to communications of that
type), by overnight courier or by mail, and shall become effective: (a) on
delivery if given in person; (b) on the date of transmission if sent by telex,
facsimile or other means of wire transmission; (c) one (1) Business Day after
delivery to the overnight service; or (d) four (4) Business Days after being
mailed, with proper postage and documentation, for first-class registered or
certified mail, prepaid.</font></p>

<p style="margin:12.0pt 0pt;text-indent:72.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notices shall be addressed as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:12.0pt 0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">If to Abbott, to:</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott Laboratories </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Dept. 0392, Bldg. AP6D </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">100 Abbott Park Road </font></p>

60064-3500 </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Attention: Chief
Operating Officer</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Facsimile Number: (847)
035-8207</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:12.0pt 0pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott Laboratories </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Dept. 0364, Bldg. AP6D </font></p>

407-0411</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:12.0pt 0pt;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">provided</font></u>, <u>however</u>, that if
any party shall have designated a different address by notice to the others,
then to the last address so designated.</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.16&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Exchange Rates</u>.&#160; If applicable Law requires that any payment
pursuant to this Agreement be made in local currency, the parties shall use the
applicable exchange rate published in The Wall Street Journal three (3)
Business Days prior to the Closing or such date as mutually agreed in writing
by the parties, except in the case of a Deferred Local Closing in which case
the parties shall use the applicable exchange rate published in the Wall Street
Journal three (3) Business Days prior to the date of the Deferred Local Closing
or such other date as mutually agreed in writing by the parties.&#160; In addition, if applicable Law requires that
the Conveyance and Assumption Instruments for a particular jurisdiction must
state the portion of Purchase Price allocated to such jurisdiction in local
currency, then the parties shall use for such purposes the exchange rate
between $ and the applicable local currency as reported on the Bloomberg screen
at 7:00 a.m. EDT on the Closing Date.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">74</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='74',FILE='C:\fc\52144734359_D11189_1741964\1583-2-ks.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 21 14:47 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.17&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Construction</u>.&#160; The language in all parts of this Agreement
shall be construed, in all cases, according to its fair meaning.&#160; The parties acknowledge that each party and
its counsel have reviewed and revised this Agreement and that any rule of construction
to the effect that any ambiguities are to be resolved against the drafting
party shall not be employed in the interpretation of this Agreement.&#160; Words in the singular shall be deemed to
include the plural and vice versa and words of one gender shall be deemed to
include the other gender as the context requires.&#160; The terms &#147;hereof,&#148; &#147;herein,&#148; and &#147;herewith&#148;
and words of similar import shall, unless otherwise stated, be construed to
refer to this Agreement as a whole (including all of the Schedules and Exhibits
hereto) and not to any particular provision of this Agreement.&#160; Article, Section, Exhibit and Schedule
references are to the Articles, Sections, Exhibits and Schedules to this
Agreement unless otherwise specified.&#160;
Unless otherwise stated, all references to any agreement shall be deemed
to include the exhibits, schedules and annexes to such agreement.&#160; The word &#147;including&#148; and words of similar
import when used in this Agreement shall mean &#147;including, without limitation,&#148;
unless the context otherwise requires or unless otherwise specified.&#160; The word &#147;or&#148; shall not be exclusive.&#160; Unless otherwise specified in a particular
case, the word &#147;days&#148; refers to calendar days.&#160;
References herein to this Agreement or any Ancillary Agreement shall be
deemed to refer to this Agreement or such Ancillary Agreement as of the date of
such agreement and as it may be amended thereafter, unless otherwise specified.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.18&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Performance of Obligations by
Affiliates</u>.&#160; Any obligation of Abbott
under or pursuant to this Agreement may be satisfied, met or fulfilled, in
whole or in part, at Abbott&#146;s sole and exclusive option, either by Abbott
directly or by any Affiliate of Abbott that Abbott causes to satisfy, meet or
fulfill such obligation in whole or in part.&#160;
Any obligation of GE under or pursuant to this Agreement may be
satisfied, met or fulfilled, in whole or in part, at GE&#146;s sole and exclusive
option, either by GE directly or by any Affiliate that GE causes to satisfy,
meet or fulfill such obligation, in whole or in part.&#160; With respect to any particular action, the
use of the words &#147;Abbott shall&#148; also means &#147;Abbott shall cause&#148; the particular
action to be performed, and the use of the words &#147;GE shall&#148; also means &#147;GE
shall cause&#148; the particular action to be performed.&#160; Each of Abbott and GE guarantees the
performance of all actions, agreements and obligations to be performed by any
of their respective Affiliates under the terms and conditions of this
Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 13.19&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Entire Agreement</u>.&#160; This Agreement may not be amended,
supplemented or otherwise modified except by an instrument in writing signed by
each of the parties hereto.&#160; This
Agreement and the Confidentiality Agreement contain the entire agreement of the
parties hereto with respect to the transactions covered hereby, superseding all
negotiations, prior discussions and preliminary agreements made prior to the
date hereof.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:12.0pt 0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">* * * * * * * * * * *</font></p>

WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Agreement to be executed by their
respective duly authorized officers as of the date first above written.</font></p>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>


<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.49</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott
Laboratories</font></u></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Performance Restricted Stock Agreement</font></u></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This
Agreement made &#171;DateAwded&#187; (the &#147;Grant Date&#148;), between Abbott Laboratories, an
Illinois corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;), and &#171;Name&#187; (the &#147;Employee&#148;), for the
grant by the Company to the Employee of a Restricted Stock Award under Section&nbsp;10
of the Company&#146;s 1996 Incentive Stock Program (the &#147;Program&#148;).&#160; This Agreement incorporates and is subject to
the provisions of the Program. Terms used herein shall have the same meaning as
in the Program, and in the event of any inconsistency between the provisions herein
and the provisions of the Program, the Program shall control.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Grant of Shares</u>.&#160; Pursuant to action of the Compensation
Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company, and in consideration of
valuable services heretofore rendered and to be rendered by the Employee to the
Company and of the agreements hereinafter set forth, the Company has granted to
the Employee &#171;NoShares12345&#187; common shares of the Company (the &#147;Shares&#148;).&#160; The Shares shall be issued from the Company&#146;s
available treasury shares.&#160; The Employee
shall have all the rights of a shareholder with respect to the Shares,
including the right to vote and to receive all dividends or other distributions
paid or made with respect to the Shares.&#160;
However, the Shares (and any securities of the Company which may be
issued with the respect to the Shares by virtue of any stock split,
combination, stock dividend or recapitalization, which securities shall be
deemed to be &#147;Shares&#148; hereunder) shall be subject to all the restrictions
hereinafter set forth.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Restriction</u>.&#160; Until the restriction imposed by this Section&nbsp;2
(the &#147;Restriction&#148;) has lapsed pursuant to Section&nbsp;3 or 4 below, the
Shares shall not be sold, exchanged, assigned, transferred, pledged or
otherwise disposed of, and shall be subject to forfeiture as set forth in Section&nbsp;5
below.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Lapse of Restriction Based on
Performance</u>.&#160; The restrictions on
one-third of the total number of Shares (rounded up) will lapse and have no
further force on the last business day of February, 2008, provided that Abbott&#146;s
prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18 percent; the restrictions on an
additional one-third of the total number of Shares (rounded up) will lapse and
have no further force on the last business day of February, 2009, provided that
Abbott&#146;s prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18 percent; the
restrictions on the remaining one-third of the total number of Shares will
lapse and have no further force on the last business day of February, 2010,
provided that Abbott&#146;s prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18 percent.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, any remaining
Shares that have not previously vested in 2008, 2009 or 2010 shall remain
outstanding and shall vest on the last business day of February, 2011 and/or
2012, provided that Abbott&#146;s prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18
percent, and provided further that no more than one-third of the Shares will
vest in any one year.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Retirement</u>.&#160; The Restriction shall continue to apply (and
may lapse in accordance with the provisions of Section&nbsp;3 above) in the
event that the Employee&#146;s employment with the Company and its subsidiaries is
terminated by the Employee due to retirement.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\fc\53113851816_D10967_1748363\1583-2-la.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 22 11:38 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Lapse of Restriction by Death or
Disability</u>.&#160; The Restriction shall
lapse and have no further force or effect upon the Employee&#146;s death or
disability.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Forfeiture of Shares</u>.&#160; I</font></font>n the event of termination of the Employee&#146;s employment with the
Company, other than under the circumstances described in Section&nbsp;4 or Section&nbsp;5
above, (including due to the Employee&#146;s voluntary resignation (other than due
to retirement) or involuntary discharge for cause),<font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman"> all of the Shares with respect to which the Restriction has not lapsed
shall be forfeited, and transferred to the Company by the Employee, without
consideration to the Employee or his executor, administrator, personal
representative or heirs (&#147;Representative&#148;).&#160;
In any such event, the Employee or his Representative shall promptly
deliver any documents requested by the Company necessary to effectuate such
transfer.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing,
in the event that the Employee is discharged by the Company other than for
cause, the Committee shall have the authority (but not the obligation) to act,
in its sole discretion, to accelerate the lapse of the Restriction.&#160; The term discharge &#147;for cause&#148; shall have the
meaning given that term by Section&nbsp;10.</font></font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Withholding Taxes</u>.&#160; The lapse of the Restriction on the Shares
pursuant to the terms hereof shall be conditioned on the Employee or the
Representative having made appropriate arrangements with the Company to provide
for the withholding of any taxes required to be withheld by federal, state or
local law with respect to such lapse.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Rights Not Enlarged</u>.&#160; Nothing herein confers on the Employee any
right to continue in the employ of the Company or of any of its subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Succession</u>.&#160; This Agreement shall be binding upon and
operate for the benefit of the Company and its successors and assigns, and the
Employee and his Representative.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Discharge for Cause</u>.&#160; The term discharge &#147;for cause&#148; shall mean
termination by the Company of the Employee&#146;s employment for (A)&nbsp;the
Employee&#146;s failure to substantially perform the duties of his employment (other
than any such failure resulting from the Employee&#146;s disability); (B)&nbsp;material
breach by the Employee of the terms and conditions of his employment; (C)&nbsp;material
breach by the Employee of business ethics; (D)&nbsp;an act of fraud,
embezzlement or theft committed by the Employee in connection with his duties
or in the course of his employment; or (E)&nbsp;wrongful disclosure by the
Employee of secret processes or confidential information of the Company or its
subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Section
409A</u>.&#160; If the Company determines that
this Agreement is subject to 409A of the Internal Revenue Code and fails to
comply with that section&#146;s requirements, the Company may, at the Company&#146;s sole
discretion, amend the Agreement to cause it to comply with Section 409A or be
exempt from Section 409A.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, the Company has caused this Award to be executed by its duly
authorized officer as of the grant date set forth above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>


<p align="right" style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.50</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott
Laboratories</font></u></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Performance Restricted Stock Agreement</font></u></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This
Agreement made &#171;DateAwded&#187; (the &#147;Grant Date&#148;), between Abbott Laboratories, an
Illinois corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;), and &#171;Name&#187; (the &#147;Employee&#148;), for the
grant by the Company to the Employee of a Performance Restricted Stock Award
under Section&nbsp;11 of the Company&#146;s 1996 Incentive Stock Program (the &#147;Plan&#148;).&#160; This Agreement incorporates and is subject to
the provisions of the Plan. Terms used herein shall have the same meaning as in
the Plan and in the event of any inconsistency between the provisions herein
and the provisions of the Plan, the Plan shall control.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Grant of Shares</u>.&#160; Pursuant to action of the Compensation
Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company, and in consideration of
valuable services heretofore rendered and to be rendered by the Employee to the
Company and of the agreements hereinafter set forth, the Company has granted to
the Employee &#171;NoShares12345&#187; common shares of the Company (the &#147;Shares&#148;).&#160; The Shares shall be issued from the Company&#146;s
available treasury shares.&#160; The Employee
shall have all the rights of a shareholder with respect to the Shares,
including the right to vote and to receive all dividends or other distributions
paid or made with respect to the Shares.&#160;
However, the Shares (and any securities of the Company which may be
issued with the respect to the Shares by virtue of any stock split,
combination, stock dividend or recapitalization, which securities shall be
deemed to be &#147;Shares&#148; hereunder) shall be subject to all the restrictions
hereinafter set forth.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Restriction</u>.&#160; Until the restriction imposed by this Section&nbsp;2
(the &#147;Restriction&#148;) has lapsed pursuant to Section&nbsp;3 or 4 below, the
Shares shall not be sold, exchanged, assigned, transferred, pledged or
otherwise disposed of, and shall be subject to forfeiture as set forth in Section&nbsp;5
below.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Lapse of Restriction Based on
Performance</u>.&#160; The restrictions on
one-third of the total number of Shares (rounded up) will lapse and have no
further force on the last business day of February, 2008, provided that Abbott&#146;s
prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18 percent; the restrictions on an
additional one-third of the total number of Shares (rounded up) will lapse and
have no further force on the last business day of February, 2009, provided that
Abbott&#146;s prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18 percent; the
restrictions on the remaining one-third of the total number of Shares will
lapse and have no further force on the last business day of February, 2010,
provided that Abbott&#146;s prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18 percent.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, any remaining
Shares that have not previously vested in 2008, 2009 or 2010 shall remain
outstanding and shall vest on the last business day of February, 2011 and/or
2012, provided that Abbott&#146;s prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18
percent, and provided further that no more than one-third of the Shares will
vest in any one year.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Retirement</u>.&#160; The Restriction shall continue to apply (and
may lapse in accordance with the provisions of Section&nbsp;3 above) in the
event that the Employee&#146;s employment with the Company and its subsidiaries is
terminated by the Employee due to retirement.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\fc\53114147528_D10967_1748363\1583-2-lc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 22 11:41 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Lapse of Restriction by Death or
Disability</u>.&#160; The Restriction shall
lapse and have no further force or effect upon the Employee&#146;s death or
disability.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Forfeiture of Shares</u>.&#160; I</font></font>n the event of termination of the Employee&#146;s employment with the
Company, other than under the circumstances described in Section&nbsp;4 or Section&nbsp;5
above, (including due to the Employee&#146;s voluntary resignation (other than due
to retirement) or involuntary discharge for cause),<font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman"> all of the Shares with respect to which the Restriction has not lapsed
shall be forfeited, and transferred to the Company by the Employee, without
consideration to the Employee or his executor, administrator, personal
representative or heirs (&#147;Representative&#148;).&#160;
In any such event, the Employee or his Representative shall promptly
deliver any documents requested by the Company necessary to effectuate such
transfer.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing,
in the event that the Employee is discharged by the Company other than for
cause, the Committee shall have the authority (but not the obligation) to act,
in its sole discretion, to accelerate the lapse of the Restriction.&#160; The term discharge &#147;for cause&#148; shall have the
meaning given that term by Section&nbsp;10.</font></font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Withholding Taxes</u>.&#160; The lapse of the Restriction on the Shares
pursuant to the terms hereof shall be conditioned on the Employee or the
Representative having made appropriate arrangements with the Company to provide
for the withholding of any taxes required to be withheld by federal, state or
local law with respect to such lapse.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Rights Not Enlarged</u>.&#160; Nothing herein confers on the Employee any
right to continue in the employ of the Company or of any of its subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Succession</u>.&#160; This Agreement shall be binding upon and
operate for the benefit of the Company and its successors and assigns, and the
Employee and his Representative.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Discharge for Cause</u>.&#160; The term discharge &#147;for cause&#148; shall mean
termination by the Company of the Employee&#146;s employment for (A)&nbsp;the
Employee&#146;s failure to substantially perform the duties of his employment (other
than any such failure resulting from the Employee&#146;s disability); (B)&nbsp;material
breach by the Employee of the terms and conditions of his employment; (C)&nbsp;material
breach by the Employee of business ethics; (D)&nbsp;an act of fraud,
embezzlement or theft committed by the Employee in connection with his duties
or in the course of his employment; or (E)&nbsp;wrongful disclosure by the
Employee of secret processes or confidential information of the Company or its
subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Construction</u>.&#160; This Performance Restricted Stock Award is
intended to qualify as qualified performance-based compensation under section&nbsp;162(m)
of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, to the extent
applicable.&#160; This Agreement shall be
construed accordingly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Section
409A</u>. &#160;If the Company determines that
this Agreement is subject to 409A of the Internal Revenue Code and fails to
comply with that section&#146;s requirements, the Company may, at the Company&#146;s sole
discretion, amend the Agreement to cause it to comply with Section 409A or be
exempt from Section 409A.</font></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, the Company has caused this Award to be executed by its duly
authorized officer as of the grant date above set forth.</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\fc\53114147528_D10967_1748363\1583-2-lc.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 22 11:41 2007' -->
