<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>


<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.51</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott
Laboratories</font></u></p>

<p align="center" style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Performance Restricted Stock Unit Agreement</font></u></p>

<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This
Agreement made &#171;DateAwded&#187; (the &#147;Grant Date&#148;), between Abbott Laboratories, an
Illinois corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;), and &#171;Name&#187; (the &#147;Employee&#148;), for the
grant by the Company to the Employee of a Restricted Stock Unit Award under the
Company&#146;s 1996 Incentive Stock Program (the &#147;Plan&#148;).&#160; This Agreement incorporates and is subject to
the provisions of the Plan.&#160; Terms used
herein shall have the same meaning as in the Plan, and in the event of any
inconsistency between the provisions herein and the provisions of the Plan, the
Plan shall control.</font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Grant of Units</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; Pursuant to action of the Compensation
Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company, and in consideration of valuable
services heretofore rendered and to be rendered by the Employee to the Company
and of the agreements hereinafter set forth, the Company has granted to the
Employee </font></font>&#171;NoShares12345&#187;
restricted stock units (the &#147;Restricted Stock Units&#148; used herein &#147;Units&#148;),
representing the right to receive an equal number of common shares of the
Company on the Delivery Date.&#160; The &#147;Delivery
Date&#148; of the shares (as defined in Sections 3, 4 and 5 below) shall be the
respective dates on which the common shares of the Company shall be payable to
the Employee after the Restriction (as defined in Section&nbsp;2 below) on such
Units lapse.&#160; Unless indicated otherwise,
the shares of stock shall be delivered in an equal number of shares (subject to
rounding) as of each Delivery Date, if there is more than one Delivery Date
applicable.&#160; The shares shall be issued
from the Company&#146;s available treasury shares.&#160;
Prior to the Delivery Date(s), (a)&nbsp;the Employee shall not be
treated as a shareholder as to those shares, and shall only have a contractual
right to receive them, unsecured by any assets of the Company or the
subsidiaries; (b)&nbsp;the Employee shall not be permitted to vote the
Restricted Stock Units; and (c)&nbsp;the Employee&#146;s right to receive such
shares will be subject to the adjustment provisions relating to mergers,
reorganizations, and similar events set forth in the Plan.&#160; The Restricted Stock Units shall be subject
to all of the restrictions hereinafter set forth.&#160; The Employee shall be permitted to receive
cash payments equal to the dividends and distributions paid on shares of stock (&#147;Dividend
Equivalents&#148;) (other than dividends or distributions of securities of the
Company which may be issued with respect to its shares by virtue of any stock
split, combination, stock dividend or recapitalization) to the same extent and
on the same date as if each Unit were a share of stock, provided, however, that
no Dividend Equivalents shall be payable to or for the benefit of the Employee
with respect to dividends or distributions the record date for which occurs on
or after either (i) the Employee has forfeited the Restricted Stock Units or (ii)
the restrictions on the Restricted Stock Units have lapsed.</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Restriction</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; Until the restriction imposed by this Section&nbsp;2
(the &#147;Restriction&#148;) has lapsed pursuant to Section&nbsp;3 or 4 below, the Units
shall not be sold, exchanged, assigned, transferred, pledged or otherwise
disposed of, and shall be subject to forfeiture as set forth in Section&nbsp;5
below.</font></font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Lapse of Restriction Based on Performance</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; The restrictions on one-third
of the total number of Units (rounded up) will lapse and have no further force
on the last business day of February, 2008, provided that Abbott&#146;s prior year
Return on Equity is a minimum of 18 percent; the restrictions on an additional
one-third of the total number of Units (rounded up) will lapse and have no
further force on the last business day of February, 2009, provided that
Abbott&#146;s prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18 percent; the
restrictions on the remaining one-third of the total number of Units will lapse
and have no further force on the last business day of February, 2010, provided
that Abbott&#146;s prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18 percent.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, any remaining
Units that have not previously vested in 2008, 2009, or 2010 shall remain
outstanding and shall vest on the last business day of February, 2011 and/or
2012, provided that Abbott&#146;s prior year Return on Equity is a minimum of 18
percent, and provided further that no more than one-third of the Units will
vest in any one year.</font></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\fc\53124517152_D11263_1748804\1583-2-le.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 22 12:45 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Retirement</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; The Restriction shall continue to apply (and
may lapse in accordance with the provisions of Section&nbsp;3 above) in the
event that the Employee&#146;s employment with the Company and its subsidiaries is
terminated by the Employee due to retirement.</font></font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Lapse of Restriction by Death or Disability</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; The Restriction shall lapse
and have no further force or effect upon the Employee&#146;s death or disability. </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;</font></font>Any Units that have not previously been paid
out on a Delivery Date set forth in Section&nbsp;3 above shall be settled in
the form of Company common stock on the date of death or disability, as the
case may be.</p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Forfeiture of Units</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; I</font></font>n the event of termination of the Employee&#146;s employment with the
Company, other than under the circumstances described in Section&nbsp;4 or Section&nbsp;5
above, (including without limitation due to the Employee&#146;s voluntary resignation
(other than due to retirement) or involuntary discharge for cause),<font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman"> all of the Units with respect to which the Restriction has not lapsed shall
be forfeited by the Employee, without consideration to the Employee or his
executor, administrator, personal representative or heirs (&#147;Representative&#148;)</font></font>,
<u>provided</u>, <u>however</u>, that in the event that the
Employee is involuntarily discharged by the Company or its subsidiaries other
than for cause, the Company shall have the authority (but not the obligation)
to act, in its sole discretion, to accelerate the lapse of Restriction set
forth in Section&nbsp;3 above and to cause any Units that have not previously
been paid out on a Delivery Date set forth in Section&nbsp;3 above to be
settled in the form of Company common stock on the date of such involuntary
discharge.<font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160; The
term discharge &#147;for cause&#148; shall have the meaning given that term by Section&nbsp;10.</font></font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Withholding Taxes</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; The lapse of the Restriction on the Shares
pursuant to the terms hereof shall be conditioned on the Employee or the
Representative having made appropriate arrangements with the Company to provide
for the withholding of any taxes required to be withheld by federal, state or
local law with respect to such lapse.</font></font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Rights Not Enlarged</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; Nothing herein confers on the Employee any
right to continue in the employ of the Company or of any of its subsidiaries.</font></font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Succession</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; This Agreement shall be binding upon and
operate for the benefit of the Company and its successors and assigns, and the
Employee and his Representative.</font></font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Discharge for Cause</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">.&#160; The term discharge &#147;for cause&#148; shall mean
termination by the Company of the Employee&#146;s employment for (A)&nbsp;the
Employee&#146;s failure to substantially perform the duties of his employment (other
than any such failure resulting from the Employee&#146;s disability);
(B)&nbsp;material breach by the Employee of the terms and conditions of his
employment; (C)&nbsp;material breach by the Employee of business ethics;
(D)&nbsp;an act of fraud, embezzlement or theft committed by the Employee in
connection with his duties or in the course of his employment; or
(E)&nbsp;wrongful disclosure by the Employee of secret processes or
confidential information of the Company or its subsidiaries.</font></font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;vertical-align:baseline;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><u><font face="Times New Roman">Payment of Dividend Equivalents</font></u></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">. For purposes of compliance with the requirements of Internal Revenue
Code Section 409A, the specified date for paying any Dividend Equivalents to which
an employee is entitled under Section 1 is the year (2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011
or 2012) in which the associated dividends or distributions are paid on common
stock.&#160; This Section 11 shall not create
or expand any rights to Dividend Equivalents.</font></font></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;vertical-align:baseline;"><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.</font></font><font style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font face="Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font></font><u>Section
409A</u>.&#160; If the Company determines that
this Agreement is subject to Section 409A and fails to comply with that section&#146;s
requirements, the Company may, at the Company&#146;s sole discretion, amend the
Agreement to cause it to comply with Section&nbsp;409A or be exempt from
Section&nbsp;409A.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


 <p style="margin:24.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p> <br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\fc\53124517152_D11263_1748804\1583-2-le.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Feb 22 12:45 2007' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">



<p style="color:windowtext;letter-spacing:0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;punctuation-wrap:simple;text-autospace:none;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN
WITNESS WHEREOF, the Company has caused this Award to be executed by its duly
authorized officer as of the grant date set forth above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.52
<SEQUENCE>9
<FILENAME>a07-1583_1ex10d52.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-10.52
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>





</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;10.52</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none;">ABBOTT LABORATORIES</font></b><font style="text-transform:none;"><br>
RESTRICTED STOCK UNIT AGREEMENT</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">This Agreement made &#171;DateAwded&#187;
(the &#147;Grant Date&#148;), between Abbott Laboratories, an Illinois corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;),
and &#171;FirstMILast&#187; (the &#147;Employee&#148;), for
the grant by the Company to the Employee of a Restricted Stock Unit Award under
the Company&#146;s 1996 Incentive Stock Program (the &#147;Plan&#148;).&#160; This Agreement incorporates and is subject to
the provisions of the Program.&#160; Terms
used herein shall have the same meaning as in the Program, and in the event of
any inconsistency between the provisions herein and the provisions of the
Program, the Program shall control.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Grant
of Units</u>.&#160; Pursuant to action of the
Compensation Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company, and in
consideration of valuable services heretofore rendered and to be rendered by
the Employee to the Company and of the agreements hereinafter set forth, the
Company has granted to the Employee &#171;NoShares12345&#187; restricted stock units (the
&#147;Restricted Stock Units&#148; or &#147;Units&#148; as used herein), representing the right to
receive an equal number of common shares of the Company on the Delivery
Date.&#160; The &#147;Delivery Date&#148; of the shares
(as defined in Sections 3, 4 and 5 below) shall be the respective dates on
which the common shares of the Company shall be payable to the Employee after
the Restriction (as defined in Section&nbsp;2 below) on such Units lapse.&#160; Unless indicated otherwise, the shares of
stock shall be delivered in an equal number of shares (subject to rounding) as
of each Delivery Date, if there is more than one Delivery Date applicable.&#160; The shares shall be issued from the Company&#146;s
available treasury shares.&#160; Prior to the
Delivery Date(s), (a)&nbsp;the Employee shall not be treated as a shareholder
as to those shares, and shall only have a contractual right to receive them,
unsecured by any assets of the Company or the subsidiaries; (b)&nbsp;the
Employee shall not be permitted to vote the Restricted Stock Units; and (c)&nbsp;the
Employee&#146;s right to receive such shares will be subject to the adjustment
provisions relating to mergers, reorganizations, and similar events set forth
in the Plan.&#160; The Restricted Stock Units
shall be subject to all of the restrictions hereinafter set forth.&#160; The
Employee shall be permitted to receive cash payments equal to the dividends and
distributions paid on shares of stock (&#147;Dividend Equivalents&#148;) (other than
dividends or distributions of securities of the Company which may be issued
with respect to its shares by virtue of any stock split, combination, stock
dividend or recapitalization) to the same extent and on the same date as if
each Unit were a share of stock, provided, however, that no Dividend
Equivalents shall be payable to or for the benefit of the Employee with respect
to dividends or distributions the record date for which occurs on or after
either (i) the Employee has forfeited the Restricted Stock Units or (ii) the
restrictions on the Restricted Stock Units have lapsed.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Restriction</u>.&#160; Until the restriction imposed by this Section&nbsp;2
(the &#147;Restriction&#148;) has lapsed pursuant to Section&nbsp;3, 4 or 5 below, the
Units shall not be sold, exchanged, assigned, transferred, pledged or otherwise
disposed of, and shall be subject to forfeiture as set forth in Section&nbsp;7
below.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Lapse
of Restriction by Passage of Time</u>.&#160;
During employment, the Restriction on one-third of the total number of
Units (rounded up) will lapse and have no further force on the first
anniversary of the Grant Date; the Restriction on an additional one-third of
the total number of Units (rounded up) will lapse and have no further force on
the second anniversary of the Grant Date; and the Restriction on the remaining
Units will lapse and have no further force on the third anniversary of the
Grant Date.&#160; Subject to Sections 4, 5 and
6 below, Units with respect to which the Restriction has lapsed shall be paid
in the form of common shares of the Company on the first, second and third
anniversaries of the date of grant (each, a &#147;Delivery Date&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Lapse
of Restriction Due to Retirement</u>.&#160; Upon
the Employee&#146;s termination of employment due to retirement, the Units shall be
settled in the form of common shares of the Company on the Delivery Dates set
forth in Section&nbsp;3 above occurring after the date of such retirement as if
the Employee had remained employed on such Delivery Dates.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\JMS\kyang\07-1583-4\task1749875\1583-4-ks.htm',USER='Kyangb',CD='Feb 22 15:15 2007' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Lapse
of Restriction by Death or Disability</u>.&#160;
The Restriction shall lapse and have no further force or effect upon the
Employee&#146;s death or disability.&#160; Any
Units that have not previously been paid out on a Delivery Date set forth in Section&nbsp;3
above shall be settled in the form of Company common stock on the date of death
or disability, as the case may be.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Forfeiture
of Units</u>.&#160; In the event of
termination of the Employee&#146;s employment with the Company, other than under the
circumstances described in Sections 4 or 5 above, (including without limitation
due to the Employee&#146;s voluntary resignation (other than due to retirement) or
involuntary discharge for cause), any Units with respect to which the
Restriction has not lapsed as of the date of termination, shall be forfeited as
of the date of termination, without consideration to the Employee or his
executor, administrator, personal representative or heirs (&#147;Representative&#148;), <u>provided</u>,
<u>however</u>, that in the event that the Employee is involuntarily discharged
by the Company or its subsidiaries other than for cause, the Company shall have
the authority (but not the obligation) to act, in its sole discretion, to
accelerate the lapse of Restriction set forth in Section&nbsp;3 above and to
cause any Units that have not previously been paid out on a Delivery Date set
forth in Section&nbsp;3 above to be settled in the form of Company common stock
on the date of such involuntary discharge. &#160;The term discharge &#147;for cause&#148; shall have the
meaning given that term by Section&nbsp;10.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Withholding
Taxes</u>.&#160; The delivery of the shares
pursuant to Section&nbsp;3, 4, 5 or 6 above shall be conditioned on the Company
providing for the automatic withholding of shares to cover any taxes as may be
required to be withheld by US federal, state, local or local law with respect
to such lapse or delivery.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Rights
Not Enlarged</u>.&#160; Nothing herein confers
on the Employee any right to continue in the employ of the Company or of any of
its subsidiaries.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Succession</u>.&#160; This Agreement shall be binding upon and
operate for the benefit of the Company and its successors and assigns, and the
Employee and his Representative.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Discharge
for Cause</u>.&#160; The term discharge &#147;for
cause&#148; shall mean termination by the Company of the Employee&#146;s employment for (A)&nbsp;the
Employee&#146;s failure to substantially perform the duties of his employment (other
than any such failure resulting from the Employee&#146;s disability); (B)&nbsp;material
breach by the Employee of the terms and conditions of his employment; (C)&nbsp;material
breach by the Employee of business ethics; (D)&nbsp;an act of fraud,
embezzlement or theft committed by the Employee in connection with his duties
or in the course of his employment; or (E)&nbsp;wrongful disclosure by the
Employee of secret processes or confidential information of the Company or its
subsidiaries.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">11.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>No Contract as of Right</u>.&#160; The
grant of Units under the Plan does not create any contractual or other right to
receive additional Restricted Stock Unit grants or other Plan benefits in the
future.&#160; Nothing contained in this
agreement is intended to create or enlarge any other contractual obligations
between the Company and the Employee.&#160;
Future grants, if any, and their terms and conditions, will be at the
sole discretion of the Compensation Committee.&#160;
Unless expressly provided by the company in writing, any value
associated with the Units granted under the Plan is an item of compensation
outside the scope of the Employee&#146;s employment contract, if any, and shall not
be deemed part of the Employee&#146;s normal or expected compensation for purposes
of calculating any severance, resignation, redundancy, or end-of-service
payments, bonuses, long-service awards, pension or retirement benefits, or similar
payments.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.</font><font size="1" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Data Privacy</u>.&#160; This
grant of Units shall be interpreted to effect the original intent of the
Company as closely as possible to the fullest extent permitted by applicable
law (including, without limitation, any laws governing data privacy).&#160; If any condition or provision of this option
is invalid,</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\kyang\07-1583-4\task1749875\1583-4-ks.htm',USER='Kyangb',CD='Feb 22 15:15 2007' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">illegal, or incapable
of being enforced under any applicable law or regulation governing data
privacy, including the privacy laws and regulations of the European economic
area, all other conditions and provisions of the Units shall nevertheless
remain in full force and effect.&#160; By
accepting this grant, the Employee voluntarily acknowledges and consents to the
collection, use, processing and transfer of personal data as described in this
paragraph.&#160; The Employee is not obliged
to consent to such collection, use, processing and transfer of personal
data.&#160; However, failure to provide the
consent may affect the Employee&#146;s ability to participate in the Plan.&#160; The company, its subsidiaries and the
Employee&#146;s employer hold certain personal information about the Employee,
including the Employee&#146;s name, home address and telephone number, date of
birth, social security number or other employee identification number, salary,
nationality, job title, the number of common shares of the Company (if any)
owned by the Employee, whether the Employee is a member of the Board of
Directors of the Company or of any of its subsidiaries, details of all stock
options or any other entitlement to common shares awarded, canceled, purchased,
vested, unvested or outstanding in the Employee&#146;s favor for the purpose of
managing and administering the Plan or this grant (collectively &#147;personal data&#148;).&#160; The Company and/or its subsidiaries will
transfer personal data amongst themselves as necessary for the purpose of
implementation, administration and management of the Employee&#146;s participation
in the Plan, and the Company and/or any of its subsidiaries may each further
transfer personal data to any third parties assisting the Company in the
implementation, administration and management of the Plan.&#160; These recipients may be located in the
European economic area, or elsewhere throughout the world, such as the United
States.&#160; The Employee hereby authorizes
them to receive, possess, use, retain and transfer the personal data, in
electronic or other form, for the purposes of implementing, administering and
managing the Employee&#146;s participation in the Plan, including any transfer of
such personal data as may be required for the administration of the Plan and/or
the </font>subsequent holding of
common shares on the Employee&#146;s behalf to a broker or other third party with
whom the Employee may elect to deposit any common shares acquired pursuant to
the Plan.&#160; The Employee may, when and to
the extent required by applicable data privacy laws, review personal data and
require any necessary amendments to it.&#160;
The employee may, at any time, withdraw the consents herein in writing
by contacting the Company; however, withdrawing the Employee&#146;s consent may
affect the Employee&#146;s ability to participate in the Plan.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">13.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Payment of Dividend Equivalents</u>.&#160; For purposes of compliance with the
requirements of Internal Revenue Code Section 409A, the specified date of paying
any Dividend Equivalents to which an Employee is entitled under Section 1 is
the year (&lt;&lt;YR1, YR2, YR3, or YR4&gt;&gt;) in which the associated
dividends or distributions are paid on common stock. This Section 13 shall not
create or expand any rights to Dividend Equivalents.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Section
409A</u>.&#160; If the Company determines that
this Agreement is subject to 409A of the Internal Revenue Code and fails to
comply with that section&#146;s requirements, the Company may, at the Company&#146;s sole
discretion, amend the Agreement to cause it to comply with Section&nbsp;409A or
be exempt from Section&nbsp;409A.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Company has caused this Award
to be executed by its duly authorized officer as of the grant date set forth
above.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit
12</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Abbott
Laboratories</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Computation of
Ratio of Earnings to Fixed Charges</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Unaudited)</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(dollars in millions)</font></p>

 <tr bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="58%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:58.98%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt 15.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:-15.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EARNINGS
  FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS <br>
  ADD (DEDUCT)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;padding:0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;width:1.0%;">
  <p align="left" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">$</font></p>
  </td>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:6.0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  interest cost</font></p>

  <p style="margin:6.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16.5</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:6.0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.76%;">
  <p style="margin:6.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14.5</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:2.38%;">
  <p style="margin:6.0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="5%" colspan="2" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:double windowtext 2.25pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:5.76%;">
  <p style="margin:6.0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">12.0</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="0%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:.34%;">
  <p style="margin:6.0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="line-height:1.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOTE:</font><font face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font>For the purpose of
calculating this ratio, (i)&nbsp;earnings from continuing operations have been
calculated by adjusting earnings from continuing operations for taxes on
earnings from continuing operations; interest expense; amortization of
capitalized interest, net of capitalized interest; minority interest; and the
portion of rentals representative of the interest factor, (ii)&nbsp;Abbott
considers one-third of rental expense to be the amount representing return on
capital, and (iii)&nbsp;fixed charges comprise total interest expense,
including capitalized interest and such portion of rentals.</p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

</div><br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

<FILENAME>a07-1583_1ex21.htm

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:right;text-indent:144.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 21</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">SUBSIDIARIES OF
ABBOTT LABORATORIES</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt;text-indent:36.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following is a
list of subsidiaries of Abbott Laboratories.&#160;
Abbott Laboratories is not a subsidiary of any other corporation.&#160; Where ownership of a subsidiary is less than
100% by Abbott Laboratories or an Abbott Laboratories&#146; subsidiary, such has
been noted by designating the percentage of ownership.</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;font-family:Times New Roman;width:100.0%;">

 <tr>
  <td width="80%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:80.58%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:12.0pt 0pt .0001pt 30.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><!-- SET mrlNoTableShading -->Abbott Knoll Investments

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">CONSENT OF
INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 36.0pt;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">We consent to the
incorporation by reference in: Registration Statement Nos.&nbsp;333-09071,
333-43381, 333-69547, 333-93253, 333-52768, 333-74228,
333-102178, 333-109250 and 333-124850 on Form&nbsp;S-8 for
the Abbott Laboratories 1996 Incentive Stock Program; Registration Statement
Nos. 333-74220, 333-102179 and 333-124851 on Form&nbsp;S-8 for
the Abbott Laboratories Deferred Compensation Plan; Registration Statement Nos.
333-75442 and 333-109254 on Form&nbsp;S-8 for the Abbott
Laboratories Affiliate Employee Stock Purchase Plan; and Registration Statement
Nos. 33-26685, 33-50452, 33-51585, 33-56897, 33-65127,
333-19511, 333-43383, 333-69579, 333-93257, 333-74224,
333-102180, 333-109253 and 333-124849 on Form&nbsp;S-8 for
the&nbsp;Abbott Laboratories Stock Retirement Program and Trusts; Post-effective
Amendment No.&nbsp;1 to Registration Statement No.&nbsp;333-85867 on
Form&nbsp;S-8 for the Perclose,&nbsp;Inc. 1992 Stock Plan, Perclose,&nbsp;Inc.
1995 Director Option Plan, Perclose,&nbsp;Inc. 1997 Stock Plan and Perclose,&nbsp;Inc.
1995 Employee Stock Purchase Plan; and Registration Statement No.&nbsp;333-109132
on Form&nbsp;S-3 of our reports dated February&nbsp;15, 2007, relating to the
financial statements and financial statement schedule of Abbott Laboratories
and subsidiaries, and management&#146;s report on the effectiveness of internal
control over financial reporting (which report on the financial statements
expresses an unqualified opinion and includes an explanatory paragraph
concerning the adoption of Statement of Financial Accounting Standards (&#147;SFAS&#148;)
No.&nbsp;158, <i>Employers&#146; Accounting for Defined Benefit
Pension and Other Postretirement Plans</i>, and SFAS No.&nbsp;123(R), <i>Share-Based Payment</i>)<i>  </i>appearing in
this Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Abbott Laboratories for the year
ended December&nbsp;31, 2006.</font></p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.1
<SEQUENCE>14
<FILENAME>a07-1583_1ex31d1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EX-31.1
<TEXT>
<html>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;31.1<a name="Exhibit31_1_172352"></a></font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Certification of
Chief Executive Officer<a name="CertificationOfChiefExecutiveOffi_172352"></a><br>
Required by Rule&nbsp;13a-14(a)&nbsp;(17 CFR 240.13a-14(a))</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I,
Miles D. White, certify that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>I have reviewed
this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Abbott Laboratories;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on my
knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact
or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on my
knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included
in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of Abbott as of, and for, the
periods presented in this report;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Abbott&#146;s other
certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e)&nbsp;and
15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f)&nbsp;and 15d-15(f)) for Abbott
and have:</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Designed such
disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and
procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to Abbott, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is
made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the
period in which this report is being prepared;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Designed such internal
control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over
financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable
assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation
of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally
accepted accounting principles;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Evaluated the
effectiveness of Abbott&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in
this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls
and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on
such evaluation; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Disclosed in this report
any change in Abbott&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred
during Abbott&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or is
reasonably likely to materially affect, Abbott&#146;s internal control over
financial reporting; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Abbott&#146;s other
certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of
internal control over financial reporting, to Abbott&#146;s auditors and the audit committee
of Abbott&#146;s board of directors:</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>All significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect Abbott&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial
information; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 24.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who
have a significant role in Abbott&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="293" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:220.0pt;">

  </td>

  <td width="608" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:455.95pt;">

  </td>

  <td width="608" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:455.95pt;">

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;31.2<a name="Exhibit31_2_172803"></a></font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Certification of
Chief Financial Officer<a name="CertificationOfChiefFinancialOffi_172803"></a><br>
Required by Rule&nbsp;13a-14(a)&nbsp;(17 CFR 240.13a-14(a))</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I,
Thomas C. Freyman, certify that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>I have reviewed
this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Abbott Laboratories;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on my
knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact
or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in
light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not
misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Based on my
knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included
in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial
condition, results of operations and cash flows of Abbott as of, and for, the
periods presented in this report;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Abbott&#146;s other
certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e)&nbsp;and
15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in
Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f)&nbsp;and 15d-15(f)) for Abbott
and have:</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Designed such
disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and
procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material
information relating to Abbott, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is
made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the
period in which this report is being prepared;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Designed such internal
control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over
financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable
assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation
of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally
accepted accounting principles;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Evaluated the
effectiveness of Abbott&#146;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in
this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls
and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on
such evaluation; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Disclosed in this report
any change in Abbott&#146;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred
during Abbott&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter that has materially affected, or is
reasonably likely to materially affect, Abbott&#146;s internal control over
financial reporting; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Abbott&#146;s other
certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of
internal control over financial reporting, to Abbott&#146;s auditors and the audit
committee of Abbott&#146;s board of directors:</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>All significant
deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal
control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely
affect Abbott&#146;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial
information; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 24.0pt 60.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who
have a significant role in Abbott&#146;s internal control over financial reporting.</p>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;32.1<a name="Exhibit32_1_173417"></a></font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Certification
Pursuant To<a name="CertificationPursuantTo_173124"></a><br>
18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350<br>
As Adopted Pursuant To<br>
Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with
the Annual Report of Abbott Laboratories (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form&nbsp;10-K
for the period ended December&nbsp;31, 2006 as filed with the Securities and
Exchange Commission (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, Miles D. White, Chairman of the Board
and Chief Executive Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167;
1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167; 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Report fully complies
with the requirements of section 13(a)&nbsp;or 15(d)&nbsp;of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects,
the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.</p>

<head>







</head>

<body lang="EN-US">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="right" style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 10.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:right;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;32.2<a name="Exhibit32_2_173530"></a></font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Certification
Pursuant To<a name="CertificationPursuantTo_173530"></a><br>
18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350<br>
As Adopted Pursuant To<br>
Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-indent:20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In connection with
the Annual Report of Abbott Laboratories (the &#147;Company&#148;) on Form&nbsp;10-K
for the period ended December&nbsp;31, 2006 as filed with the Securities and
Exchange Commission (the &#147;Report&#148;), I, Thomas C. Freyman, Executive Vice
President, Finance and Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify,
pursuant to 18 U.S.C. &#167; 1350, as adopted pursuant to &#167; 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley
Act of 2002, that:</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 6.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Report fully complies
with the requirements of section 13(a)&nbsp;or 15(d)&nbsp;of the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934; and</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt 12.0pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-20.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The
information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects,
the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.</p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse:collapse;">
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="304" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:227.75pt;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><!-- SET mrlHTMLTableLeft --><!-- SET mrlNoTableShading -->/s/ THOMAS
  C. FREYMAN</p>
  </td>
  <td width="304" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:227.8pt;">
  <p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
